}
}

/**
* å°†æ•´æ•°å½¢å¼RGBé¢œè‰²å€¼è½¬æ¢ä¸ºHEXå½¢å¼
*/
Number.prototype.toColorPart = function() {
var digits = this.toString(16);
if (this < 16) return â€˜0â€™ + digits;
return digits;
}

/**
* å…¸å‹ Ruby é£æ ¼çš„å‡½æ•°ï¼Œå°†å‚æ•°ä¸­çš„æ–¹æ³•é€ä¸ªè°ƒç”¨ï¼Œè¿”å›ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæˆåŠŸæ‰§è¡Œçš„æ–¹æ³•çš„è¿”å›å€¼
*/
var Try = {
these: function() {
var returnValue;

for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {
var lambda = arguments[i];
try {
returnValue = lambda();
break;
} catch (e) {}
}

return returnValue;
}
}

/*â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€“*/

/**
* ä¸€ä¸ªè®¾è®¡ç²¾å·§çš„å®šæ—¶æ‰§è¡Œå™¨
* é¦–å…ˆç”± Class.create() åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ª PeriodicalExecuter ç±»å‹ï¼Œ
* ç„¶åç”¨å¯¹è±¡ç›´æ¥é‡çš„è¯­æ³•å½¢å¼è®¾ç½®åŸå‹ã€‚
*
* éœ€è¦ç‰¹åˆ«è¯´æ˜çš„æ˜¯ rgisterCallback æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå®ƒè°ƒç”¨ä¸Šé¢å®šä¹‰çš„å‡½æ•°åŸå‹æ–¹æ³•bind, å¹¶ä¼ é€’è‡ªå·±ä¸ºå‚æ•°ã€‚
* ä¹‹æ‰€ä»¥è¿™æ ·åšï¼Œæ˜¯å› ä¸º setTimeout é»˜è®¤æ€»ä»¥ window å¯¹è±¡ä¸ºå½“å‰å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯è¯´ï¼Œå¦‚æœ registerCallback æ–¹æ³•å®šä¹‰å¦‚ä¸‹çš„è¯ï¼š
* registerCallback: function() {
* setTimeout(this.onTimerEvent, this.frequency * 1000);
* }
* é‚£ä¹ˆï¼Œthis.onTimeoutEvent æ–¹æ³•æ‰§è¡Œå¤±è´¥ï¼Œå› ä¸ºå®ƒæ— æ³•è®¿é—® this.currentlyExecuting å±æ€§ã€‚
* è€Œä½¿ç”¨äº†bindä»¥åï¼Œè¯¥æ–¹æ³•æ‰èƒ½æ­£ç¡®çš„æ‰¾åˆ°thisï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯PeriodicalExecuterçš„å½“å‰å®ä¾‹ã€‚
*/
var PeriodicalExecuter = Class.create();
PeriodicalExecuter.prototype = {
initialize: function(callback, frequency) {
this.callback = callback;
this.frequency = frequency;
this.currentlyExecuting = false;

this.registerCallback();
},

registerCallback: function() {
setTimeout(this.onTimerEvent.bind(this), this.frequency * 1000);
},

onTimerEvent: function() {
if (!this.currentlyExecuting) {
try {
this.currentlyExecuting = true;
this.callback();
} finally {
this.currentlyExecuting = false;
}
}

this.registerCallback();
}
}

/*â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€“*/

/**
* è¿™ä¸ªå‡½æ•°å°± Ruby äº†ã€‚æˆ‘è§‰å¾—å®ƒçš„ä½œç”¨ä¸»è¦æœ‰ä¸¤ä¸ª
* 1. å¤§æ¦‚æ˜¯ document.getElementById(id) çš„æœ€ç®€åŒ–è°ƒç”¨ã€‚
* æ¯”å¦‚ï¼š$(â€œaaaâ€) å°†è¿”å›ä¸Š aaa å¯¹è±¡
* 2. å¾—åˆ°å¯¹è±¡æ•°ç»„
* æ¯”å¦‚: $(â€œaaaâ€,â€bbbâ€) è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªåŒ…æ‹¬idä¸ºâ€aaaâ€å’Œâ€bbbâ€ä¸¤ä¸ªinputæ§ä»¶å¯¹è±¡çš„æ•°ç»„ã€‚
*/
function $() {
var elements = new Array();

for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {
var element = arguments[i];
if (typeof element == â€˜stringâ€™)
element = document.getElementById(element);

if (arguments.length == 1)
return element;

elements.push(element);
}

return elements;
}
/**
* å®šä¹‰ Ajax å¯¹è±¡, é™æ€æ–¹æ³• getTransport æ–¹æ³•è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ª XMLHttp å¯¹è±¡
*/
var Ajax = {
getTransport: function() {
return Try.these(
function() {return new ActiveXObject(â€˜Msxml2.XMLHTTPâ€™)},
function() {return new ActiveXObject(â€˜Microsoft.XMLHTTPâ€™)},
function() {return new XMLHttpRequest()}
) || false;
},

emptyFunction: function() {}
}

/**
* æˆ‘ä»¥ä¸ºæ­¤æ—¶çš„Ajaxå¯¹è±¡èµ·åˆ°å‘½åç©ºé—´çš„ä½œç”¨ã€‚
* Ajax.Base å£°æ˜ä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªåŸºç¡€å¯¹è±¡ç±»å‹
* æ³¨æ„ Ajax.Base å¹¶æ²¡æœ‰ä½¿ç”¨ Class.create() çš„æ–¹å¼æ¥åˆ›å»ºï¼Œæˆ‘æƒ³æ˜¯å› ä¸ºä½œè€…å¹¶ä¸å¸Œæœ› Ajax.Base è¢«åº“ä½¿ç”¨è€…å®ä¾‹åŒ–ã€‚
* ä½œè€…åœ¨å…¶ä»–å¯¹è±¡ç±»å‹çš„å£°æ˜ä¸­ï¼Œå°†ä¼šç»§æ‰¿äºå®ƒã€‚
* å°±å¥½åƒ java ä¸­çš„ç§æœ‰æŠ½è±¡ç±»
*/
Ajax.Base = function() {};
Ajax.Base.prototype = {
/**
* extend (è§prototype.jsä¸­çš„å®šä¹‰) çš„ç”¨æ³•çœŸæ˜¯è®©äººè€³ç›®ä¸€æ–°
* options é¦–å…ˆè®¾ç½®é»˜è®¤å±æ€§ï¼Œç„¶åå† extend å‚æ•°å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå‚æ•°å¯¹è±¡ä¸­ä¹Ÿæœ‰åŒåçš„å±æ€§ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå°±è¦†ç›–é»˜è®¤å±æ€§å€¼ã€‚
* æƒ³æƒ³å¦‚æœæˆ‘å†™è¿™æ ·çš„å®ç°ï¼Œåº”è¯¥ç±»ä¼¼å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š
setOptions: function(options) {
this.options.methed = options.methed? options.methed : â€˜postâ€™;
â€¦â€¦â€¦.
}
æˆ‘æƒ³å¾ˆå¤šæ—¶å€™ï¼Œjava é™åˆ¶äº† js çš„åˆ›æ„ã€‚
*/
setOptions: function(options) {
this.options = {
method: â€˜postâ€™,
asynchronous: true,
parameters: â€˜â€™
}.extend(options || {});
}
}

/**
* Ajax.Request å°è£… XmlHttp
*/
Ajax.Request = Class.create();

/**
* å®šä¹‰å››ç§äº‹ä»¶(çŠ¶æ€)ï¼Œ å‚è€ƒhttp://msdn.microsoft.com/workshop/a...adystate_1.asp
*/
Ajax.Request.Events =
[â€˜Uninitializedâ€™, â€˜Loadingâ€™, â€˜Loadedâ€™, â€˜Interactiveâ€™, â€˜Completeâ€™];

/**
*
*/
Ajax.Request.prototype = (new Ajax.Base()).extend({
initialize: function(url, options) {
this.transport = Ajax.getTransport();
this.setOptions(options);

try {
if (this.options.method == â€˜getâ€™)
url += â€˜?â€™ + this.options.parameters + â€˜&_=â€™;

/**
* æ­¤å¤„å¥½åƒå¼ºåˆ¶ä½¿ç”¨äº†å¼‚æ­¥æ–¹å¼ï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯ä¾ç…§ this.options.asynchronous çš„å€¼
*/
this.transport.open(this.options.method, url, true);

/**
* è¿™é‡Œæä¾›äº† XmlHttp ä¼ è¾“è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­æ¯ä¸ªæ­¥éª¤çš„å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°
*/
if (this.options.asynchronous) {
this.transport.onreadystatechange = this.onStateChange.bind(this);
setTimeout((function() {this.respondToReadyState(1)}).bind(this), 10);
}

this.transport.setRequestHeader(â€˜X-Requested-Withâ€™, â€˜XMLHttpRequestâ€™);
this.transport.setRequestHeader(â€˜X-Prototype-Versionâ€™, Prototype.Version);

if (this.options.method == â€˜postâ€™) {
this.transport.setRequestHeader(â€˜Connectionâ€™, â€˜closeâ€™);
this.transport.setRequestHeader(â€˜Content-typeâ€™,
â€˜application/x-www-form-urlencodedâ€™);
}

this.transport.send(this.options.method == â€˜postâ€™ ?
this.options.parameters + â€˜&_=â€™ : null);

} catch (e) {
}
},

onStateChange: function() {
var readyState = this.transport.readyState;
/**
* å¦‚æœä¸æ˜¯ Loading çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œå°±è°ƒç”¨å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°
*/
if (readyState != 1)
this.respondToReadyState(this.transport.readyState);
},

/**
* å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°å®šä¹‰åœ¨ this.options å±æ€§ä¸­ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚:
var option = {
onLoaded : function(req) {â€¦};
â€¦â€¦
}
new Ajax.Request(url, option);
*/
respondToReadyState: function(readyState) {
var event = Ajax.Request.Events[readyState];
(this.options[â€˜onâ€™ + event] || Ajax.emptyFunction)(this.transport);
}
});

/**
* Ajax.Updater ç”¨äºç»‘å®šä¸€ä¸ªhtmlå…ƒç´ ä¸ XmlHttpè°ƒç”¨çš„è¿”å›å€¼ã€‚ç±»ä¼¼ä¸ buffalo çš„ bindã€‚
* å¦‚æœ options ä¸­æœ‰ insertion(from dom.js) å¯¹è±¡çš„è¯, insertion èƒ½æä¾›æ›´å¤šçš„æ’å…¥æ§åˆ¶ã€‚
*/
Ajax.Updater = Class.create();
Ajax.Updater.prototype = (new Ajax.Base()).extend({
initialize: function(container, url, options) {
this.container = $(container);

},

updateContent: function() {

new this.options.insertion(this.container,
this.request.transport.responseText);
} else {
this.container.innerHTML = this.request.transport.responseText;
}

if (this.onComplete) {
setTimeout((function() {this.onComplete(this.request)}).bind(this), 10);
}
}
});
/**
* é’ˆå¯¹ é¡µé¢å…ƒç´ å¯¹è±¡ çš„å·¥å…·ç±»ï¼Œæä¾›ä¸€äº›ç®€å•é™æ€æ–¹æ³•
*/
var Field = {
/**
* æ¸…é™¤å‚æ•°å¼•ç”¨å¯¹è±¡çš„å€¼
*/
clear: function() {
for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++)
$(arguments[i]).value = â€˜â€™;
},

/**
* ä½¿å‚æ•°å¼•ç”¨å¯¹è±¡è·å–ç„¦ç‚¹
*/
focus: function(element) {
$(element).focus();
},

/**
* åˆ¤æ–­å‚æ•°å¼•ç”¨å¯¹è±¡å€¼æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œå¦‚ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œè¿”å›false, åä¹‹true
*/
present: function() {
for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++)
if ($(arguments[i]).value == â€˜â€™) return false;
return true;
},

/**
* ä½¿é€‰ä¸­å‚æ•°å¼•ç”¨å¯¹è±¡
*/
select: function(element) {

},

* ä½¿å‚æ•°å¼•ç”¨å¯¹è±¡å¤„äºå¯ç¼–è¾‘çŠ¶æ€
*/
activate: function(element) {

$(element).select();

/*â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€“*/

/**
* è¡¨å•å·¥å…·ç±»
*/
var Form = {
/**
* å°†è¡¨å•å…ƒç´ åºåˆ—åŒ–åçš„å€¼ç»„åˆæˆ QueryString çš„å½¢å¼
*/
serialize: function(form) {
var elements = Form.getElements($(form));
var queryComponents = new Array();

for (var i = 0; i < elements.length; i++) {
var queryComponent = Form.Element.serialize(elements[i]);
if (queryComponent)
queryComponents.push(queryComponent);
}

return queryComponents.join(â€˜&â€™);
},

/**
* å¾—åˆ°è¡¨å•çš„æ‰€æœ‰å…ƒç´ å¯¹è±¡
*/
getElements: function(form) {
form = $(form);
var elements = new Array();

for (tagName in Form.Element.Serializers) {
var tagElements = form.getElementsByTagName(tagName);
for (var j = 0; j < tagElements.length; j++)
elements.push(tagElements[j]);
}
return elements;
},

/**
* å°†æŒ‡å®šè¡¨å•çš„å…ƒç´ ç½®äºä¸å¯ç”¨çŠ¶æ€
*/
disable: function(form) {
var elements = Form.getElements(form);
for (var i = 0; i < elements.length; i++) {
var element = elements[i];
element.blur();
element.disable = â€˜trueâ€™;

},

entry.title: prototype.jsæºç è§£è¯»(äºŒ)-CarlZeng
entry.content:
/** * ä½¿è¡¨å•çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªé hidden ç±»å‹è€Œä¸”å¤„äºå¯ç”¨çŠ¶æ€çš„å…ƒç´ è·å¾—ç„¦ç‚¹ */ focusFirstElement: function(form) { form = $(form); var elements = Form.getElements(form); for (var i = 0; i < elements.length; i++) { var element â€¦

/**
* ä½¿è¡¨å•çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªé hidden ç±»å‹è€Œä¸”å¤„äºå¯ç”¨çŠ¶æ€çš„å…ƒç´ è·å¾—ç„¦ç‚¹
*/
focusFirstElement: function(form) {
form = $(form);
var elements = Form.getElements(form);
for (var i = 0; i < elements.length; i++) {
var element = elements[i];
if (element.type != â€˜hiddenâ€™ && !element.disabled) {
Field.activate(element);
break;
}
}
},

/*
* é‡ç½®è¡¨å•
*/
reset: function(form) {
$(form).reset();
}
}

/**
* è¡¨å•å…ƒç´ å·¥å…·ç±»
*/
Form.Element = {
/**
* è¿”å›è¡¨å•å…ƒç´ çš„å€¼å…ˆåºåˆ—åŒ–å†è¿›è¡Œ URL ç¼–ç åçš„å€¼
*/
serialize: function(element) {
element = $(element);
var method = element.tagName.toLowerCase();
var parameter = Form.Element.Serializers[method](element);

if (parameter)
return encodeURIComponent(parameter[0]) + â€˜=â€™ +
encodeURIComponent(parameter[1]);
},

/**
* è¿”å›è¡¨å•å…ƒç´ åºåˆ—åŒ–åçš„å€¼
*/
getValue: function(element) {
element = $(element);
var method = element.tagName.toLowerCase();
var parameter = Form.Element.Serializers[method](element);

if (parameter)
return parameter[1];
}
}

/**
* prototype çš„æ‰€è°“åºåˆ—åŒ–å…¶å®å°±æ˜¯å°†è¡¨å•çš„åå­—å’Œå€¼ç»„åˆæˆä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„
*/
Form.Element.Serializers = {
input: function(element) {
switch (element.type.toLowerCase()) {
case â€˜hiddenâ€™:
case â€˜passwordâ€™:
case â€˜textâ€™:
return Form.Element.Serializers.textarea(element);
case â€˜checkboxâ€™:
case â€˜radioâ€™:
return Form.Element.Serializers.inputSelector(element);
}
return false;
},

inputSelector: function(element) {
if (element.checked)
return [element.name, element.value];
},

textarea: function(element) {
return [element.name, element.value];
},

/**
* çœ‹æ ·å­ï¼Œä¹Ÿä¸æ”¯æŒå¤šé€‰æ¡†(select-multiple)
*/
select: function(element) {
var index = element.selectedIndex;
var value = element.options[index].value || element.options[index].text;
return [element.name, (index >= 0) ? value : â€˜â€™];
}
}

/*â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€“*/

/**
* Form.Element.getValue ä¹Ÿè®¸ä¼šç»å¸¸ç”¨åˆ°ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥åšäº†ä¸€ä¸ªå¿«æ·å¼•ç”¨
*/
var $F = Form.Element.getValue;

/*â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€“*/

/**
* Abstract.TimedObserver ä¹Ÿæ²¡æœ‰ç”¨ Class.create() æ¥åˆ›å»ºï¼Œå’ŒAjax.Base æ„å›¾åº”è¯¥ä¸€æ ·
* Abstract.TimedObserver é¡¾åæ€ä¹‰ï¼Œæ˜¯å¥—ç”¨Observerè®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼æ¥è·Ÿè¸ªæŒ‡å®šè¡¨å•å…ƒç´ ï¼Œ
* å½“è¡¨å•å…ƒç´ çš„å€¼å‘ç”Ÿå˜åŒ–çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œå°±æ‰§è¡Œå›è°ƒå‡½æ•°
*
* æˆ‘æƒ³ã€€Observer ä¸æ³¨å†Œonchangeäº‹ä»¶ç›¸ä¼¼ï¼Œä¸åŒç‚¹åœ¨äº onchange äº‹ä»¶æ˜¯åœ¨å…ƒç´ å¤±å»ç„¦ç‚¹çš„æ—¶å€™æ‰æ¿€å‘ã€‚
* åŒæ ·çš„ä¸ onpropertychange äº‹ä»¶ä¹Ÿç›¸ä¼¼ï¼Œä¸è¿‡å®ƒåªå…³æ³¨è¡¨å•å…ƒç´ çš„å€¼çš„å˜åŒ–ï¼Œè€Œä¸”æä¾›timeoutçš„æ§åˆ¶ã€‚
*
* é™¤æ­¤ä¹‹å¤–ï¼ŒObserver çš„å¥½å¤„å¤§æ¦‚å°±åœ¨ä¸æ›´é¢å‘å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œå¦å¤–å¯ä»¥åŠ¨æ€çš„æ›´æ¢å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°ï¼Œè¿™å°±æ¯”æ³¨å†Œäº‹ä»¶è¦çµæ´»ä¸€äº›ã€‚
* Observer åº”è¯¥å¯ä»¥èƒœä»»åŠ¨æ€æ•°æ®æ ¡éªŒï¼Œæˆ–è€…å¤šä¸ªå…³è”ä¸‹æ‹‰é€‰é¡¹åˆ—è¡¨çš„è¿åŠ¨ç­‰ç­‰
*
*/
Abstract.TimedObserver = function() {}

/**
* è¿™ä¸ªè®¾è®¡å’Œ PeriodicalExecuter ä¸€æ ·ï¼Œbind æ–¹æ³•æ˜¯å®ç°çš„æ ¸å¿ƒ
*/
Abstract.TimedObserver.prototype = {
initialize: function(element, frequency, callback) {
this.frequency = frequency;
this.element = $(element);
this.callback = callback;

this.lastValue = this.getValue();
this.registerCallback();
},

registerCallback: function() {
setTimeout(this.onTimerEvent.bind(this), this.frequency * 1000);
},

onTimerEvent: function() {
var value = this.getValue();
if (this.lastValue != value) {
this.callback(this.element, value);
this.lastValue = value;
}

this.registerCallback();
}
}

/**
* Form.Element.Observer å’Œ Form.Observer å…¶å®æ˜¯ä¸€æ ·çš„
* æ³¨æ„ Form.Observer å¹¶ä¸æ˜¯ç”¨æ¥è·Ÿè¸ªæ•´ä¸ªè¡¨å•çš„ï¼Œæˆ‘æƒ³å¤§æ¦‚åªæ˜¯ä¸ºäº†å‡å°‘ä¹¦å†™(è¿™æ˜¯Rubyçš„ä¸€ä¸ªè®¾è®¡åŸåˆ™)
*/
Form.Element.Observer = Class.create();
Form.Element.Observer.prototype = (new Abstract.TimedObserver()).extend({
getValue: function() {
return Form.Element.getValue(this.element);
}
});

Form.Observer = Class.create();
Form.Observer.prototype = (new Abstract.TimedObserver()).extend({
getValue: function() {
return Form.serialize(this.element);
}
});
/**
* æ ¹æ® class attribute çš„åå­—å¾—åˆ°å¯¹è±¡æ•°ç»„ï¼Œæ”¯æŒ multiple class
*
*/
document.getElementsByClassName = function(className) {
var children = document.getElementsByTagName(â€˜*â€˜) || document.all;
var elements = new Array();

for (var i = 0; i < children.length; i++) {
var child = children[i];
var classNames = child.className.split(â€˜ â€˜);
for (var j = 0; j < classNames.length; j++) {
if (classNames[j] == className) {
elements.push(child);
break;
}
}
}

return elements;
}

/*â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€“*/

/**
* Element å°±è±¡ä¸€ä¸ª java çš„å·¥å…·ç±»ï¼Œä¸»è¦ç”¨æ¥ éšè—/æ˜¾ç¤º/é”€é™¤ å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œä»¥åŠè·å–å¯¹è±¡çš„ç®€å•å±æ€§ã€‚
*
*/
var Element = {
toggle: function() {
for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {
var element = $(arguments[i]);
element.style.display =
(element.style.display == â€˜noneâ€™ ? â€˜â€™ : â€˜noneâ€™);
}
},

hide: function() {
for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {
var element = $(arguments[i]);
element.style.display = â€˜noneâ€™;
}
},

show: function() {
for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i++) {
var element = $(arguments[i]);
element.style.display = â€˜â€™;
}
},

remove: function(element) {
element = $(element);
element.parentNode.removeChild(element);
},

getHeight: function(element) {

return element.offsetHeight;
}
}

/**
* ä¸º Element.toggle åšäº†ä¸€ä¸ªç¬¦å·è¿æ¥ï¼Œå¤§æ¦‚æ˜¯å…¼å®¹æ€§çš„è€ƒè™‘
*/
var Toggle = new Object();
Toggle.display = Element.toggle;

/*â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€“*/

/**
* åŠ¨æ€æ’å…¥å†…å®¹çš„å®ç°ï¼ŒMSçš„Jscriptå®ç°ä¸­å¯¹è±¡æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ª insertAdjacentHTML æ–¹æ³•(http: //msdn.microsoft.com/workshop/author/dhtml/reference/methods/insertadjacenthtml.asp)
* è¿™é‡Œç®—æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡å½¢å¼çš„å°è£…ã€‚
*/
Abstract.Insertion = function(adjacency) {
this.adjacency = adjacency;
}

Abstract.Insertion.prototype = {
initialize: function(element, content) {
this.element = $(element);
this.content = content;

if (this.adjacency && this.element.insertAdjacentHTML) {
this.element.insertAdjacentHTML(this.adjacency, this.content);
} else {
/**
* gecko ä¸æ”¯æŒ insertAdjacentHTML æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œä½†å¯ä»¥ç”¨å¦‚ä¸‹ä»£ç ä»£æ›¿
*/
this.range = this.element.ownerDocument.createRange();
/**
* å¦‚æœå®šä¹‰äº† initializeRange æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œåˆ™å®è¡Œï¼Œè¿™é‡Œç›¸å½“ä¸å®šä¹‰äº†ä¸€ä¸ªæŠ½è±¡çš„ initializeRange æ–¹æ³•
*/
if (this.initializeRange) this.initializeRange();
this.fragment = this.range.createContextualFragment(this.content);

/**
* insertContent ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæŠ½è±¡æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå­ç±»å¿…é¡»å®ç°
*/

}
}

/**
* prototype åŠ æ·±äº†æˆ‘çš„ä½“ä¼šï¼Œå°±æ˜¯å†™js å¦‚ä½•å»éµå¾ªã€€Donâ€™t Repeat Yourself (DRY) åŸåˆ™
* ä¸Šæ–‡ä¸­ Abstract.Insertion ç®—æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæŠ½è±¡ç±»ï¼Œå®šä¹‰äº†åä¸ºã€€initializeRange çš„ä¸€ä¸ªæŠ½è±¡æ–¹æ³•
* var Insertion = new Object()ã€€å»ºç«‹ä¸€ä¸ªå‘½åç©ºé—´
* Insertion.Before|Top|Bottom|After å°±è±¡æ˜¯å››ä¸ªjavaä¸­çš„å››ä¸ªé™æ€å†…éƒ¨ç±»ï¼Œè€Œå®ƒä»¬åˆ†åˆ«ç»§æ‰¿äºAbstract.Insertionï¼Œå¹¶å®ç°äº†initializeRangeæ–¹æ³•ã€‚
*/
var Insertion = new Object();

Insertion.Before = Class.create();
Insertion.Before.prototype = (new Abstract.Insertion(â€˜beforeBeginâ€™)).extend({
initializeRange: function() {
this.range.setStartBefore(this.element);
},

/**
* å°†å†…å®¹æ’å…¥åˆ°æŒ‡å®šèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å‰é¢, ä¸æŒ‡å®šèŠ‚ç‚¹åŒçº§
*/
insertContent: function() {
this.element.parentNode.insertBefore(this.fragment, this.element);
}
});

Insertion.Top = Class.create();
Insertion.Top.prototype = (new Abstract.Insertion(â€˜afterBeginâ€™)).extend({
initializeRange: function() {
this.range.selectNodeContents(this.element);
this.range.collapse(true);
},

/**
* å°†å†…å®¹æ’å…¥åˆ°æŒ‡å®šèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå­èŠ‚ç‚¹å‰ï¼Œäºæ˜¯å†…å®¹å˜ä¸ºè¯¥èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå­èŠ‚ç‚¹
*/
insertContent: function() {
this.element.insertBefore(this.fragment, this.element.firstChild);
}
});

Insertion.Bottom = Class.create();
Insertion.Bottom.prototype = (new Abstract.Insertion(â€˜beforeEndâ€™)).extend({
initializeRange: function() {
this.range.selectNodeContents(this.element);
this.range.collapse(this.element);
},

/**
* å°†å†…å®¹æ’å…¥åˆ°æŒ‡å®šèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„æœ€åï¼Œäºæ˜¯å†…å®¹å˜ä¸ºè¯¥èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªå­èŠ‚ç‚¹
*/
insertContent: function() {
this.element.appendChild(this.fragment);
}
});

Insertion.After = Class.create();
Insertion.After.prototype = (new Abstract.Insertion(â€˜afterEndâ€™)).extend({
initializeRange: function() {
this.range.setStartAfter(this.element);
},

/**
* å°†å†…å®¹æ’å…¥åˆ°æŒ‡å®šèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„åé¢, ä¸æŒ‡å®šèŠ‚ç‚¹åŒçº§
*/
insertContent: function() {
this.element.parentNode.insertBefore(this.fragment,
this.element.nextSibling);
}
});

function NLDate_parseString(sDate, bDoAlert) { var m=0; var d=0; var y=0; var val = sDate; var fmterr = â€œâ€; var year=â€â€; var year_char_index, month_char_index, day_char_index; var rtnDate = nuâ€¦

function NLDate_parseString(sDate, bDoAlert)
{
var m=0;
var d=0;
var y=0;
var val = sDate;
var fmterr = â€œâ€;
var year=â€â€;
var year_char_index, month_char_index, day_char_index;
var rtnDate = null;

if(!window.dateformat)    window.dateformat = "MM/DD/YYYY";   if(sDate == ""){    return new Date();}else if(window.dateformat == "MM/DD/YYYY"){    if (val.indexOf("/") != -1)    {        var c = val.split("/");        if(onlydigits(c\[0\])) m = parseInt(c\[0\],10);        if(onlydigits(c\[1\])) d = parseInt(c\[1\],10);        if ( d > 1970 )        {            year = y = d;            d = 1;        }        else        {            if(onlydigits(c\[2\])) y = parseInt(c\[2\],10);            year=c\[2\];        }    }    else    {        var l = val.length, str;        str = val.substr(0,2-l%2); if(onlydigits(str)) m = parseInt(str,10);        str = val.substr(2-l%2,2); if(onlydigits(str)) d = parseInt(str,10);        str = val.substr(4-l%2);   if(onlydigits(str)) y = parseInt(str,10);        year=str;    }}else if(window.dateformat == "DD/MM/YYYY"){    if (val.indexOf("/") != -1)    {        var c = val.split("/");        if(onlydigits(c\[0\])) d = parseInt(c\[0\],10);        if(onlydigits(c\[1\])) m = parseInt(c\[1\],10);        if(onlydigits(c\[2\])) y = parseInt(c\[2\],10);        year=c\[2\];    }    else    {        var l = val.length, str;        str = val.substr(0,2-l%2); if(onlydigits(str)) d = parseInt(str,10);        str = val.substr(2-l%2,2); if(onlydigits(str)) m = parseInt(str,10);        str = val.substr(4-l%2);   if(onlydigits(str)) y = parseInt(str,10);        year=str;    }}else if(window.dateformat == "YYYY/MM/DD"){    if (val.indexOf("/") != -1)    {        var c = val.split("/");        if(onlydigits(c\[0\])) y = parseInt(c\[0\],10);        if(onlydigits(c\[1\])) m = parseInt(c\[1\],10);        if(onlydigits(c\[2\])) d = parseInt(c\[2\],10);        year=c\[0\];    }    else    {        var l = val.length, str;        str = val.substr(0,2-l%2); if(onlydigits(str)) y = parseInt(str,10);        str = val.substr(2-l%2,2); if(onlydigits(str)) m = parseInt(str,10);        str = val.substr(4-l%2);   if(onlydigits(str)) d = parseInt(str,10);        year=str;    }}else if(window.dateformat == "DD.MM.YYYY"){    if (val.indexOf(".") != -1)    {        var c = val.split(".");        if(onlydigits(c\[0\])) d = parseInt(c\[0\],10);        if(onlydigits(c\[1\])) m = parseInt(c\[1\],10);        if(onlydigits(c\[2\])) y = parseInt(c\[2\],10);        year=c\[2\];    }    else    {        var l = val.length, str;        str = val.substr(0,2-l%2); if(onlydigits(str)) d = parseInt(str,10);        str = val.substr(2-l%2,2); if(onlydigits(str)) m = parseInt(str,10);        str = val.substr(4-l%2);   if(onlydigits(str)) y = parseInt(str,10);        year=parseInt(str,10);    }}else if(window.dateformat == "DD-Mon-YYYY"){    if (val.indexOf("-") != -1)    {        var c = val.split("-");        if(onlydigits(c\[0\])) d = parseInt(c\[0\],10);        m = getMonthIndex(c\[1\]);        <!--alert('month index....'+m+','+c\[1\]);-->        if(onlydigits(c\[2\])) y = parseInt(c\[2\],10);        year=c\[2\];    }    else    {        var l = val.length, str;        str = val.substr(0,1+l%2); if(onlydigits(str)) d = parseInt(str,10);        str = val.substr(1+l%2,3);        m = getMonthIndex(str);        str = val.substr(4+l%2);   if(onlydigits(str)) y = parseInt(str,10);        year=str;    }}else if(window.dateformat == "DD-MONTH-YYYY"){    var comps = val.split("-");    if(onlydigits(comps\[0\]))        d = parseInt(comps\[0\]);    m = arrayIndexOf(NLDate\_months, comps\[1\], true) + 1;    if(onlydigits(comps\[2\]))    {        y = parseInt(comps\[2\]);        year = y;    }}else if(window.dateformat == "YYYY-MM-DD"){    var comps = val.split("-");    if(onlydigits(comps\[2\]))        d = parseInt(comps\[2\]);    if(onlydigits(comps\[1\]))        m = parseInt(comps\[1\]);    if(onlydigits(comps\[0\]))    {        y = parseInt(comps\[0\]);        year = y;    }}    else if(window.dateformat == "EEYYå¹´MMæœˆDDæ—¥"){    year\_char\_index = val.indexOf(year\_char\_cn);    month\_char\_index = val.indexOf(month\_char\_cn);    day\_char\_index = val.indexOf(day\_char\_cn);    if(onlydigits(val.substring(month\_char\_index+1,day\_char\_index)))        d = parseInt(val.substring(month\_char\_index+1,day\_char\_index));    if(onlydigits(val.substring(year\_char\_index+1,month\_char\_index)))        m = parseInt(val.substring(year\_char\_index+1,month\_char\_index));    var era = val.substring(0, 2);    if(onlydigits(val.substring(2,year\_char\_index)))    {        y = get\_gregorian\_year(parseInt(val.substring(2,year\_char\_index)), era);        year = y;    }}    else if(window.dateformat == "YYYYå¹´MMæœˆDDæ—¥"){    year\_char\_index = val.indexOf(year\_char\_cn);    month\_char\_index = val.indexOf(month\_char\_cn);    day\_char\_index = val.indexOf(day\_char\_cn);    if(onlydigits(val.substring(month\_char\_index+1,day\_char\_index)))        d = parseInt(val.substring(month\_char\_index+1,day\_char\_index));    if(onlydigits(val.substring(year\_char\_index+1,month\_char\_index)))        m = parseInt(val.substring(year\_char\_index+1,month\_char\_index));    if(onlydigits(val.substring(0,year\_char\_index)))    {        y = parseInt(val.substring(0,year\_char\_index));        year = y;    }}else if(window.dateformat == "EYY.MM.DD"){    comps = val.split(".");    if(onlydigits(comps\[2\]))        d = parseInt(comps\[2\]);    if(onlydigits(comps\[1\]))        m = parseInt(comps\[1\]);    var era = comps\[0\].substring(0, 1);    if(onlydigits(comps\[0\].substring(1,comps\[0\].length)))    {        y = get\_gregorian\_year(parseInt(comps\[0\].substring(1,comps\[0\].length)), era);        year = y;    }}else if(window.dateformat == "DD. Mon YYYY"){    comps = val.split(" ");    if(onlydigits(comps\[0\].substring(0, comps\[0\].length - 1)))        d = parseInt(comps\[0\].substring(0, comps\[0\].length - 1));    m = getMonthIndex(comps\[1\]);    if(onlydigits(comps\[2\]))    {        y = parseInt(comps\[2\]);        year = y;    }}else if(window.dateformat == "DD de MONTH de YYYY"){    comps = val.split(" de ");    if(onlydigits(comps\[0\]))        d = parseInt(comps\[0\]);    m = arrayIndexOf(NLDate\_months, comps\[1\]) + 1;    if(onlydigits(comps\[2\]))    {        y = parseInt(comps\[2\]);        year = y;    }}    else if(window.dateformat == "YYYYë…„ MMì›” DDì¼"){    comps = val.split(" ");    if(onlydigits(comps\[2\].substring(0, comps\[2\].length-1)))        d = parseInt(comps\[2\].substring(0, comps\[2\].length-1));    if(onlydigits(comps\[1\].substring(0, comps\[1\].length-1)))        m = parseInt(comps\[1\].substring(0, comps\[1\].length-1)) - 1;    if(onlydigits(comps\[0\].substring(0, comps\[0\].length-1)))    {        y = parseInt(comps\[0\].substring(0, comps\[0\].length-1));        year = y;    }}    else if(window.dateformat == "DD MONTH YYYY")    {            comps = val.split(" ");            if(onlydigits(comps\[0\]))                    d = parseInt(comps\[0\]);            m = arrayIndexOf(NLDate\_months, comps\[1\], true) + 1;            if(onlydigits(comps\[2\]))            {                    y = parseInt(comps\[2\]);                    year = y;            }    }    else if(window.dateformat == "DD MONTH, YYYY")    {            comps = val.split(" ");            if(onlydigits(comps\[0\]))                    d = parseInt(comps\[0\]);            m = arrayIndexOf(NLDate\_months, comps\[1\].substring(0, comps\[1\].length-1), true) + 1;            if(onlydigits(comps\[2\]))            {                    y = parseInt(comps\[2\]);                    year = y;            }    }if(m==0 || d==0){    if(bDoAlert)    {        if(fmterr == "")            fmterr = window.dateformat;        alert("æ— æ•ˆæ—¥æœŸå€¼ï¼ˆå¿…é¡»ä¸º"+window.dateformat+"ï¼‰");    }}else{    if (y==0 && !onlydigits(year)) y = (new Date()).getFullYear();      if(m<1) m=1; else if(m>12) m=12;    if(d<1) d=1; else if(d>31) d=31;    if(y<100) y+=((y>=70)?1900:2000);    if(y<1000) y\*=10;    if (y > 9999) y = (new Date()).getFullYear();    year = y;            rtnDate = validateDate(new Date(y, m-1, d), bDoAlert);}return rtnDate;

}

åŸæ–‡åœ°å€ï¼šsetTimeoutå’ŒclearTimeoutçš„ç”¨æ³• setTimeout è®¾ç½®å®šæ—¶å™¨ï¼Œåœ¨ä¸€æ®µæ—¶é—´ä¹‹åæ‰§è¡ŒæŒ‡å®šçš„ä»£ç ï¼ŒsetTimeoutä¸setIntervalçš„åŒºåˆ«åœ¨äºsetTimeoutå‡½æ•°æŒ‡å®šçš„ä»£ç ä»…æ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡ æ–¹æ³•ä¸€ï¼š window.setTimeout(â€œalert(â€˜okâ€™)â€,5000); æ–¹æ³•äºŒï¼š window.setTimeout(function() { aleâ€¦

/*

//â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€“//
// å…¬ç”¨çš„å‡½æ•°
//â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€“//
// åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯IE
function isIE() {
return document.all && window.external;
}

// å»é™¤å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ä¸¤è¾¹çš„ç©ºæ ¼
String.prototype.trim = function() {
var re = /(^\s*)|(\s*)$/g;
return this.replace(re, â€œâ€);
}

// åˆ é™¤æ•°ç»„ä¸­æŸä¸ªå…ƒç´ 
Array.prototype.remove = function(i) {
var o = this[i];
for (var j = i; j < this.length - 1; j ++) {
this[j] = this[j + 1];
}
-- this.length;
return o;
}

// åˆ¤æ–­ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„ä¸­æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨ç›¸åŒçš„å…ƒç´ 
Array.prototype.search = function(o) {
for (var i = 0; i < this.length; i ++) {
if (this[i] == o) {
return i;
}
}

return -1;
}

// htmlç¼–ç 
function htmlEncode(s) {
s = s.replace(/&/g, â€œ&â€);
s = s.replace(/</g, â€œ<â€);
s = s.replace(/>/g, â€œ>â€);
s = s.replace(/\â€œ/g, â€œâ€â€);
s = s.replace(/\/g, â€œâ€â€);

return s;
}

// jsç¼–ç 
function jsEncode(s) {
s = s.replace(/\/g, â€œ\\â€œ);
s = s.replace(/ /g, â€œ\nâ€);
s = s.replace(/\â€œ/g, â€œ\\â€œâ€);
s = s.replace(/\/g, â€œ\\â€œ);
return s;
}

//â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€“//
// å‘½ä»¤è¡Œçª—å£å·¥å…·
//â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€“//
function Console(parentNode, processInputProc) {
// çª—å£
var panel = document.createElement(â€œdivâ€);
panel.style.width = â€œ250pxâ€;
panel.style.height = â€œ250pxâ€;
panel.style.borderColor = â€œ#666666â€;
panel.style.borderWidth = â€œ1pxâ€;
panel.style.backgroundColor = â€œ#ffffffâ€;
panel.style.borderStyle = â€œsolidâ€;
panel.style.position = â€œabsoluteâ€;
panel.style.zIndex = 100;
parentNode.appendChild(panel);

// æ ‡é¢˜æ 
var title = document.createElement(â€œdivâ€);
title.style.width = â€œ250pxâ€;
title.style.height = â€œ15pxâ€;
title.style.backgroundColor = â€œ#ddddddâ€;
title.style.fontSize = â€œ12pxâ€;
title.style.fontFamily = â€œverdana,tahomaâ€;
panel.appendChild(title);

// æ ‡é¢˜æ æ‹–åŠ¨çª—å£åŠŸèƒ½
var isDragging = false;
var startPos = new Position(panel.offsetLeft, panel.offsetTop);
var startMousePos = new Position(0, 0);

title.onmouseover = function(evt) {
this.style.cursor = â€œpointerâ€;
}

title.onmousedown = function(evt) {
if (isDragging == true) {
return;
}

var event = evt || window.event;
startMousePos.x = event.clientX;
startMousePos.y = event.clientY;
isDragging = true;
}

title.onmousemove = function(evt) {
if (isDragging == false) {
return;
}

activateWindow();
var event = evt || window.event;
panel.style.left = (event.clientX - startMousePos.x) + startPos.x + â€œpxâ€;
panel.style.top = (event.clientY - startMousePos.y) + startPos.y + â€œpxâ€;
}

title.onmouseup = function(evt) {
if (isDragging == false) {
return;
}

var event = evt || window.event;
startPos.x = (event.clientX - startMousePos.x) + startPos.x;
panel.style.left = startPos.x + â€œpxâ€;
startPos.y = (event.clientY - startMousePos.y) + startPos.y;
panel.style.top = startPos.y + â€œpxâ€;
isDragging = false;
}

// å…³é—­çª—å£åŠŸèƒ½
var closeButton = document.createElement(â€œdivâ€);
closeButton.style.width = â€œ13pxâ€;
closeButton.style.height = â€œ13pxâ€;
closeButton.style.backgroundColor = â€œ#ffffffâ€;
closeButton.style.styleFloat = closeButton.style.cssFloat = â€œleftâ€;
closeButton.style.fontSize = â€œ12pxâ€;
closeButton.style.borderWidth = â€œ1pxâ€;
closeButton.style.borderColor = â€œ#999999â€;
closeButton.style.borderStyle = â€œsolidâ€;
closeButton.style.paddingButton = â€œ2pxâ€;
closeButton.innerHTML = â€œ<div style=\â€œmargin-top: -2px;margin-left: 3px;\â€œ>xâ€œ;
title.appendChild(closeButton);

var isVisible = true;

// çª—å£å…³é—­
closeButton.onclick = function(evt) {
isVisible = false;
panel.style.display = â€œnoneâ€;
}

// æ ‡é¢˜æ æ–‡å­—
var titleLabel = document.createElement(â€œdivâ€);
titleLabel.style.height = â€œ14pxâ€;
titleLabel.style.width = â€œ200pxâ€;
titleLabel.style.fontSize = â€œ11pxâ€;
titleLabel.style.color = â€œ#ffffffâ€;
titleLabel.style.styleFloat = titleLabel.style.cssFloat = â€œleftâ€;
titleLabel.style.fontFamily = â€œverdana,tahomaâ€;
titleLabel.innerHTML = â€œJavascript Inline Debuggerâ€;
//titleLabel.style.marginTop = isIE() ? -14 : â€œ-14pxâ€;
titleLabel.style.marginLeft = isIE() ? 18 : â€œ18pxâ€;
title.appendChild(titleLabel);

// ä¸­é—´çš„æ˜¾ç¤ºéƒ¨åˆ†
var showPanel = document.createElement(â€œdivâ€);
showPanel.style.width = â€œ250pxâ€;
showPanel.style.height = isIE() ? â€œ221pxâ€ : â€œ219pxâ€;
showPanel.style.fontSize = â€œ11pxâ€;
showPanel.style.padding = â€œ0â€;
showPanel.style.margin = â€œ0â€;
showPanel.style.overflow = â€œautoâ€;
showPanel.style.marginTop = isIE() ? -1 : â€œ0â€;
panel.appendChild(showPanel);

// å‘½ä»¤è¾“å…¥æ¡†
var cmdArea = document.createElement(â€œdivâ€);
panel.appendChild(cmdArea);

var cmdTextbox = document.createElement(â€œinputâ€);
cmdTextbox.type = â€œtextâ€;
cmdTextbox.style.width = â€œ250pxâ€;
cmdTextbox.style.height = â€œ12pxâ€;
cmdTextbox.style.fontSize = â€œ12pxâ€;
cmdTextbox.style.padding = â€œ0â€;
cmdTextbox.style.margin = â€œ0â€;
cmdTextbox.style.marginTop = isIE() ? -2 : â€œ0â€;
cmdTextbox.style.borderWidth = â€œ0â€;
cmdTextbox.style.borderTopWidth = â€œ1pxâ€;
cmdTextbox.style.paddingTop = â€œ2pxâ€;
cmdArea.appendChild(cmdTextbox);

// çª—å£æ¿€æ´»æˆ–è€…ä¸æ¿€æ´»
var isActive = false;

// æ¿€æ´»çª—å£
var activateWindow = function() {
if (! isVisible) {
return;
}

if (isActive) {
return;
}

cmdTextbox.focus();
title.style.backgroundColor = â€œ#015DF4â€;
isActive = true;
}

panel.onclick = activateWindow;

// ä¸æ¿€æ´»çª—å£
var deactivateWindow = function() {
if (! isVisible) {
return;
}

if (! isActive) {
return;
}

title.style.backgroundColor = â€œ#ccccccâ€;
isActive = false;
}

cmdTextbox.onfocus = activateWindow;
cmdTextbox.onblur = deactivateWindow;

// è¾“å‡ºå‡½æ•°
var dbgPrint = function(s) {
showPanel.innerHTML += htmlEncode(s).replace(/ |( )/g, â€œ
â€œ);

if (parseInt(showPanel.scrollHeight) > parseInt(showPanel.style.height)) {
showPanel.scrollTop += parseInt(showPanel.scrollHeight) - parseInt(showPanel.style.height);
}
}

// è°ƒç”¨è¾“å…¥å¤„ç†å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°
cmdTextbox.onkeydown = function(evt) {
var event = evt || window.event;

if (event.keyCode == 0x0d) {
processInputProc(this.value, dbgPrint);
this.value = â€œâ€;
}
}
}

// åæ ‡ç±»
function Position(x, y) {
this.x = x;
this.y = y;
}

//â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€“//
// å†…è”è°ƒè¯•å™¨ç±»
//â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€“//
function InlineDebugger() {
var bpList = new Array();
var id_eval;

// è®¾ç½®æ–­ç‚¹
var bp = function(funcName) {
// æ£€æŸ¥evalæ˜¯å¦è¢«hook
if ((new String(eval)).indexOf(â€œ[native code]â€œ) < 0) {
return â€œerror: eval function was hooked by other codes in the front. â€;
}

// ä¿å­˜æœªè¢«hookedçš„eval
id_eval = eval;

var re = /^[a-zA-Z0-9_\.]+$/i;
if (! re.test(funcName)) {
return â€œerror: bad argument of command bp \â€œâ€ + funcName + â€œ\â€œ. â€;
}

try {
id_eval(â€œif (typeof(â€œ + funcName + â€œ) == \â€œobject\â€œ || typeof(â€œ + funcName + â€œ) == \â€œfunction\â€œ) {var obj = â€œ + funcName + â€œ;}â€);
} catch (e) {
return â€œerror: â€œ + e + â€œ, invalid function name \â€œâ€ + funcName + â€œ\â€œ. â€;
}

if (obj == undefined) {
return â€œerror: the argument of command bp \â€œâ€ + funcName + â€œ\â€œ is not a function object. â€;
}

if ((new String(obj)).indexOf(â€œfunctionâ€) < 0) {
return â€œerror: the argument of command bp \â€œâ€ + funcName + â€œ\â€œ is a property, a function is required. â€;
}

if (bpList.search(funcName) >= 0) {
return â€œerror: there is a breakpoint on function \â€œâ€ + funcName + â€œ\â€œ â€;
}

try {
var sc = â€œwindow.â€ + funcName.replace(/\./g, â€œ_â€œ) + â€œ_bak = â€œ + funcName + â€œ; â€ +
funcName + â€œ = â€œ +
â€œfunction() { â€ +
â€œ var args = \â€œ\â€œ; â€ +
â€œ for (var i = 0; i < arguments.length; i ++) { â€ +
â€œ args += arguments[i] + (i == (arguments.length - 1) ? \â€œ\â€œ : \â€œ,\â€œ); â€ +
â€œ } â€ +
â€œ if (confirm(\â€œfunction \\â€œâ€ + funcName + â€œ\\â€œ was called, execute it?\n\narguments:\n\â€œ + args + \â€œ\n\ncaller:\n\â€œ + â€œ + funcName + â€œ.caller)) { â€ +
â€œ id_eval(\â€œâ€ + funcName.replace(/\./g, â€œ_â€œ) + â€œ_bak(\\â€œ\â€œ + jsEncode(args) + \â€œ\\â€œ)\â€œ); â€ +
â€œ } â€ +
â€œ};â€ +
â€œ â€;
id_eval(sc);
bpList.push(funcName);
return â€œ* breakpoint on function \â€œâ€ + funcName + â€œ\â€œ added successfully. â€;
} catch (e) {
return â€œunkown error: â€œ + e + â€œ. â€;
}
}

// æšä¸¾æ‰€æœ‰çš„æ–­ç‚¹
var bl = function() {
if (bpList.length == 0) {
return â€œ* no breakpoint. â€;
}

var bps = â€œ* â€œ + bpList.length + â€œ breakpoints: â€;

for (var i = 0; i < bpList.length; i ++) {
bps += i + â€œ - â€œ + bpList[i] + â€œ â€;
}

return bps;
}

// æ¸…é™¤æŸä¸ªæ–­ç‚¹
var bc = function(n) {
try {
n = parseInt(n);
} catch (e) {
return â€œerror: bc command requires a numeric argument. â€;
}

if (bpList.length == 0) {
return â€œerror: no breakpoint. â€;
}

var funcName = bpList.remove(n);

try {
eval(funcName + â€œ = window.â€ + funcName.replace(/\./g, â€œ_â€œ) + â€œ_bak;â€);
return â€œ* breakpoint on function \â€œâ€ + funcName + â€œ\â€œ deleted successfully. â€;
} catch (e) {
return â€œerror: â€œ + e + â€œ. â€;
}
}

// å¸®åŠ©
var help = function() {
var s = â€œdebug commands: â€ +
â€œbp - set a breakpoint on a function, e.g. \â€œbp window.alert\â€œ. â€ +
â€œbl - list all breakpoints. â€ +
â€œbc - remove a breakpoint by specified number, e.g. \â€œbc 0\â€œ. â€ +
â€œhelp - help information. â€
â€œ â€;
return s;
}

// å¤„ç†å‘½ä»¤
this.exeCmd = function(cmd) {
cmd = cmd.trim();
var cmdParts = cmd.split(/\s+/g);
var cmdName;
var cmdArg;

if (cmdParts.length == 1) {
cmdName = cmd;
} else {
cmdName = cmdParts[0];
cmdArg = cmdParts[1];
}

switch (cmdName) {
case â€œbpâ€:
if (cmdArg == undefined) {
return â€œerror: bp command requires an argument. â€;
} else {
return bp(cmdArg);
}
break;

case â€œblâ€:
return bl();
break;

case â€œbcâ€:
if (cmdArg == undefined) {
return â€œerror: bc command requires an argument \â€œnumber of breakpoint\â€œ. â€;
} else {
return bc(cmdArg);
}
break;

case â€œhelpâ€:
return help();
break;

default: return â€œerror: command \â€œâ€ + cmdName + â€œ\â€œ not found, you can get information by \â€œhelp\â€œ command. â€;
break;
}
}
}

//â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€“//
// ä¸»è¿‡ç¨‹
//â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€“//
/*try {
debugger;
} catch (e) {}*/
var id = new InlineDebugger();
var console = new Console(document.body, function(s, printProc){printProc(id.exeCmd(s));});

å®ç°è¿‡ç¨‹ï¼šâ€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€” Â Â 
* @param url URL of request handlerÂ Â  Â 
* @param methodName method name on remote object to callÂ Â  Â 
* @param methodParams an array of parameters to the methodÂ Â  Â 
* @param asyncCallback a callback if this is to be an async request. Callback signature should be: callback(result, error)Â Â  Â 
*/Â Â  Â 
function nlapiServerCall(url, methodName, methodParams, asyncCallback)Â Â  Â 
{Â Â  Â 
return nsServerCall(url, methodName, methodParams, asyncCallback);Â Â  Â 
}Â Â  Â 
Â Â  Â 
function nlapiLocalCall(func, timeoutinmillis)Â Â  Â 
{Â Â  Â 
nsapiAssertTrue(timeoutinmillis != null && !isNaN(parseInt(timeoutinmillis)), â€˜SSS_INVALID_ARGUMENTâ€™, â€˜timeoutinmillis: â€˜+timeoutinmillis)Â Â  Â 
var obj = new Object()Â Â  Â 
obj.trigger = nsapiQueryScript(â€œtriggerâ€)Â Â  Â 
obj.scriptid = nsapiQueryScript(â€œscriptidâ€)Â Â  Â 
if ( timeoutinmillis == -1 )Â Â  Â 
return nsapiCallScript(obj.trigger, obj.scriptid, func)Â Â  Â 
return setTimeout( function() { nsapiCallScript(obj.trigger, obj.scriptid, func); }, timeoutinmillis );Â Â  Â 
}Â Â  Â 
-â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”

/**
* @param url URL of request handler
* @param methodName method name on remote object to call
* @param methodParams an array of parameters to the method
* @param asyncCallback a callback if this is to be an async request. Callback signature should be: callback(result, error)
*/
function nsServerCall(url, methodName, methodParams, asyncCallback)
{
var client = new NLJsonRpcClient(url);
return client.sendRequest(methodName, methodParams, asyncCallback);
}

NLJsonRpcClient = function (serverURL)
{
if (serverURL.indexOf(â€œ?â€) > 0)
serverURL = serverURL + â€œ&jrpc=Tâ€;
else
serverURL = serverURL + â€œ?jrpc=Tâ€;
this.serverURL = serverURL;
this.responseCallbackMap = {};
};
NLJsonRpcClient.requestId = 0;
NLJsonRpcClient.prototype =
{
sendRequest : function (methodName, args, callback)
{
var jsonRpcReq = {
id : NLJsonRpcClient.requestId++,
method : â€œremoteObject.â€ + methodName,
params : args || []
};
if (callback != null)
this.responseCallbackMap[jsonRpcReq.id] = callback;
var request = new NLXMLHttpRequest();
if (callback != null)
request.setResponseHandler(this.handleResponseAsync.bindAsEventListener(this));
var response = request.requestURL(this.serverURL, toJSON(jsonRpcReq), null, callback != null ? true : false);
if (callback == null)
{
var jsonRpcResp = this.getJsonRpcResponse(response);
if (jsonRpcResp.error)
throw new NLXMLResponseError(jsonRpcResp.error.code, jsonRpcResp.error.trace, jsonRpcResp.error.msg);
response = jsonRpcResp.result;
}
return response;
}, 

getJsonRpcResponse : function (nlXMLResponseObj)  {      var jsonRpcResp = nlXMLResponseObj.getBody();      if (jsonRpcResp != null)          jsonRpcResp = jsonRpcResp.replace(/^\\s\*<!--\[\\s\\S\]\*?-->\\s\*$/gm, '');      eval("jsonRpcResp = " + jsonRpcResp + ";");      return jsonRpcResp;  },  handleResponseAsync : function (nlXMLResponseObj)  {      var jsonRpcResp = this.getJsonRpcResponse(nlXMLResponseObj);      var callback = this.responseCallbackMap\[jsonRpcResp.id\];      this.responseCallbackMap\[jsonRpcResp.id\] = null;      callback(jsonRpcResp.result, jsonRpcResp.error);  }

}

function toJSON(o)
{
if (o == null)
return â€œnullâ€;
else if(o.constructor == String || o.constructor.name == â€œStringâ€)
return escapeJSONString(o);
else if(o.constructor == Number || o.constructor.name == â€œNumberâ€)
return o.toString();
else if(o.constructor == Boolean || o.constructor.name == â€œBooleanâ€)
return o.toString();
else if(o.constructor == Date || o.constructor.name == â€œDateâ€)
return â€˜{javaClass: â€œjava.util.Dateâ€, time: â€˜ + o.valueOf() +â€™}â€™;
else if((o.constructor == Array || o.constructor.name == â€œArrayâ€))
{
var v = [];
for (var i = 0; i < o.length; i++) v.push(toJSON(o[i]));
return â€œ[â€œ + v.join(â€œ, â€œ) + â€œ]â€œ;
}
else
{
var v = [];
for(attr in o)
{
if(o[attr] == null) v.push(â€œ\â€œâ€ + attr + â€œ\â€œ: nullâ€);
else if(typeof o[attr] == â€œfunctionâ€); /* skip */
else v.push(escapeJSONString(attr) + â€œ: â€œ + toJSON(o[attr]));
}
return â€œ{â€œ + v.join(â€œ, â€œ) + â€œ}â€;
}
}

è‹±æ–‡è§£é‡Šï¼šMSDN JScript Reference: The escape method returns a string value (in Unicode format) that contains the contents of [the argument]. All spaces, punctuation, accented characters, and any other non-ASCII characters are replaced with %xx encoding, where xx is equivalent to the hexadecimal number representing the character. For example, a space is returned as â€œ%20.â€
Edge Core Javascript Guide: The escape and unescape functions let you encode and decode strings. The escape function returns the hexadecimal encoding of an argument in the ISO Latin character set. The unescape function returns the ASCII string for the specified hexadecimal encoding value.

encodeURI() æ–¹æ³•ï¼šæŠŠURIå­—ç¬¦ä¸²é‡‡ç”¨UTF-8ç¼–ç æ ¼å¼è½¬åŒ–æˆescapeæ ¼å¼çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ã€‚ä¸ä¼šè¢«æ­¤æ–¹æ³•ç¼–ç çš„å­—ç¬¦ï¼š! @ # $& * ( ) = : / ; ? + â€˜
è‹±æ–‡è§£é‡Šï¼š MSDN JScript Reference: The encodeURI method returns an encoded URI. If you pass the result to decodeURI, the original string is returned. The encodeURI method does not encode the following characters: â€œ:â€, â€œ/â€œ, â€œ;â€, and â€œ?â€. Use encodeURIComponent to encode these characters. encodeURIComponent() æ–¹æ³•ï¼šæŠŠURIå­—ç¬¦ä¸²é‡‡ç”¨UTF-8ç¼–ç æ ¼å¼è½¬åŒ–æˆescapeæ ¼å¼çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ã€‚ä¸encodeURI()ç›¸æ¯”ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•å°†å¯¹æ›´å¤šçš„å­—ç¬¦è¿›è¡Œç¼–ç ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚ / ç­‰å­—ç¬¦ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥å¦‚æœå­—ç¬¦ä¸²é‡Œé¢åŒ…å«äº†URIçš„å‡ ä¸ªéƒ¨åˆ†çš„è¯ï¼Œä¸èƒ½ç”¨è¿™ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•æ¥è¿›è¡Œç¼–ç ï¼Œå¦åˆ™ / å­—ç¬¦è¢«ç¼–ç ä¹‹åURLå°†æ˜¾ç¤ºé”™è¯¯ã€‚ä¸ä¼šè¢«æ­¤æ–¹æ³•ç¼–ç çš„å­—ç¬¦ï¼š! * ( )
è‹±æ–‡è§£é‡Šï¼š MSDN JScript Reference: The encodeURIComponent method returns an encoded URI. If you pass the result to decodeURIComponent, the original string is returned. Because the encodeURIComponent method encodes all characters, be careful if the string represents a path such as /folder1/folder2/default.html. The slash characters will be encoded and will not be valid if sent as a request to a web server. Use the encodeURI method if the string contains more than a single URI component. è‹±æ–‡æ³¨é‡Šï¼šThe escape() method does not encode the + character which is interpreted as a space on the server side as well as generated by forms with spaces in their fields. Due to this shortcoming, you should avoid use of escape() whenever possible. The best alternative is usually encodeURIComponent().Use of the encodeURI() method is a bit more specialized than escape() in that it encodes for URIs [REF] as opposed to the querystring, which is part of a URL. Use this method when you need to encode a string to be used for any resource that uses URIs and needs certain characters to remain un-encoded. Note that this method does not encode the â€˜ character, as it is a valid character within URIs.Lastly, the encodeURIComponent() method should be used in most cases when encoding a single component of a URI. This method will encode certain chars that would normally be recognized as special chars for URIs so that many components may be included. Note that this method does not encode the â€˜ character, as it is a valid character within URIs.

function genCodeStr(){
var codeRE = new RegExp(â€œâ€˜(.*)â€™ : â€˜(.*)â€™â€,â€giâ€);
var tempStr,codeStr = â€œâ€;
var myReader = new Reader();
myReader.loadFile(â€˜inc/gb2312_utf.txtâ€™);//è¿™é‡Œæ”¹æˆä½ çš„å¯¹ç…§è¡¨å­˜æ”¾çš„è·¯å¾„
while(!myReader.fStream.atEndofLine) {
tempStr = new String(myReader.fStream.readLine());
codeStr += tempStr.replace(codeRE,â€$1â€) + â€œ:â€ + tempStr.replace(codeRE,â€$2â€) + â€œ:â€;
}
Application(â€œcodeDataâ€) = codeStr;
}
function getCodeStr(){
var codeStr = new String(Application(â€œcodeDataâ€));
if(codeStr.indexOf(â€œ%a1%a1â€) == -1){
genCodeStr();
}
return new String(Application(â€œcodeDataâ€));
}
function gb2utf(gbStr){
var codeStr = getCodeStr();
var codeRE = new RegExp(â€œ(%..%..)â€,â€giâ€);
var replaceRE = new RegExp(â€œ(%..%..)â€,â€iâ€);
var gbCode;
var utfCode;
var gbStart;
while((codeRE.lastIndex < gbStr.length) && replaceRE.test(gbStr)){
codeRE.exec(gbStr);
gbCode = new String(RegExp.$1);
gbStart = new Number(codeStr.indexOf(gbCode.toLowerCase()));
var utfStart = 0;
if(gbStart != -1){
utfStart= gbStart + 7;
utfCode = codeStr.substring(utfStart,utfStart + 6);
}else{
utfCode = â€œ%u3000â€;
}
gbStr = gbStr.replace(replaceRE,utfCode);
}
return gbStr;
}

function Reader() { //Class Reader()
this.fso; //Private fso
this.fUri; //Private fUri
this.fStream; //Private fStream
try{
this.fso = new ActiveXObject(â€œScripting.FileSystemObjectâ€);
}catch(exception) {
throw exception;
}
this.loadFile = function(file) { //Public loadFile(file)
this.fUri = Server.mappath(file);
//var fStream = fso.CreateTextFile(tfolder,true,false);
//fStream.WriteLine(â€˜testâ€™);
if(this.fso.fileExists(this.fUri)){
this.fStream = this.fso.openTextFile(this.fUri);
}else{
Response.write(â€˜file dos not existâ€™);
}
}
this.readLineN = function(num) {
var i = 1;
while(i < num && !this.fStream.atEndOfLine) {
this.fStream.skipLine();
i++
}
return this.fStream.readLine();
}
this.closeFile = function() {
fStream.Close();
fso.Close;
}
}

NLAlertDialog = Class.create();

NLAlertDialog.TYPE_LOWEST_PRIORITY = 0;
NLAlertDialog.TYPE_LOW_PRIORITY = 1;
NLAlertDialog.TYPE_MEDIUM_PRIORITY = 2;
NLAlertDialog.TYPE_HIGH_PRIORITY = 3;

NLAlertDialog.prototype =
{
initialize: function(sId)
{
this.sId = sId || â€œNLAlertDialogâ€;
},

show: function(sTitle, sMessage, iType, sTargetDivId)
{
var posX = document.body.clientWidth / 2;
var posY = document.body.clientHeight / 2;

var sTitleId = this.sId + â€˜_titleâ€™;
var sMessageId = this.sId + â€˜_messageâ€™;

if(!iType) iType = NLAlertDialog.TYPE_LOW_PRIORITY;

if (!this.hndDialogDiv)
{
this.hndDialogDiv = document.createElement(â€œdivâ€);
this.hndDialogDiv.innerHTML = getAlertBoxHtml(sTitle, sMessage, iType);
this.hndDialogDiv.style.display = â€œnoneâ€;
this.hndDialogDiv.style.position = â€œabsoluteâ€;
document.body.appendChild(this.hndDialogDiv);
}
if (sTargetDivId != null)
{
$(sTargetDivId).innerHTML = this.hndDialogDiv.innerHTML;
return;
}
if (this.hndDialogDiv.style.display == â€œblockâ€)
return;
this.hndDialogDiv.style.display = â€œblockâ€;
this.hndDialogDiv.style.top = posY - (this.hndDialogDiv.clientHeight / 2);
this.hndDialogDiv.style.left = posX - (this.hndDialogDiv.clientWidth / 2);
},

hide: function( sTargetDivId )
{
if (sTargetDivId != null)
$(sTargetDivId).innerHTML = â€œâ€;
else if (this.hndDialogDiv != null)
this.hndDialogDiv.style.display = â€œnoneâ€;
}
}

entry.title: UTF-8è½¬GB2312å‡½æ•° {è£…è½½ http://www.jaron.cn/chs_scripts/8/2006-10/101872.shtml}-CarlZeng
entry.content:
<% â€˜ç”¨é€”:å°‡UTF-8ç·¨ç¢¼æ¼¢å­—è½‰æ›ç‚ºGB2312ç¢¼ï¼Œå…¼å®¹è‹±æ–‡å’Œæ•¸å­— â€˜ç‰ˆæ¬Š:é›–èªªæ˜¯åŸå‰µï¼Œå…¶å¯¦ä¹Ÿåƒè€ƒäº†åˆ¥äººçš„éƒ¨åˆ†ç®—æ³• â€˜ç”¨æ³•:Response.write UTF2GB(â€œ%E9%83%BD%E5%B8%82%E6%83%85%E7%B7%A3 %E6%98%9F%E5%BA%A7â€) function UTF2GB(UTFStr) for Dig=1 to len(UTFStrâ€¦

<%
â€˜ç”¨é€”:å°‡UTF-8ç·¨ç¢¼æ¼¢å­—è½‰æ›ç‚ºGB2312ç¢¼ï¼Œå…¼å®¹è‹±æ–‡å’Œæ•¸å­—
â€˜ç‰ˆæ¬Š:é›–èªªæ˜¯åŸå‰µï¼Œå…¶å¯¦ä¹Ÿåƒè€ƒäº†åˆ¥äººçš„éƒ¨åˆ†ç®—æ³•
â€˜ç”¨æ³•:Response.write UTF2GB(â€œ%E9%83%BD%E5%B8%82%E6%83%85%E7%B7%A3 %E6%98%9F%E5%BA%A7â€)

function UTF2GB(UTFStr)
for Dig=1 to len(UTFStr)
if mid(UTFStr,Dig,1)=â€%â€ then
if len(UTFStr) >= Dig+8 then
GBStr=GBStr & ConvChinese(mid(UTFStr,Dig,9))
Dig=Dig+8
else
GBStr=GBStr & mid(UTFStr,Dig,1)
end if
else
GBStr=GBStr & mid(UTFStr,Dig,1)
end if
next
UTF2GB=GBStr
end function

function ConvChinese(x)
A=split(mid(x,2),â€%â€)
i=0
j=0

for i=0 to ubound(A)
A(i)=c16to2(A(i))
next

for i=0 to ubound(A)-1
DigS=instr(A(i),â€0â€)
Unicode=â€â€
for j=1 to DigS-1
if j=1 then
A(i)=right(A(i),len(A(i))-DigS)
Unicode=Unicode & A(i)
else
i=i+1
A(i)=right(A(i),len(A(i))-2)
Unicode=Unicode & A(i)
end if
next

if len(c2to16(Unicode))=4 then
ConvChinese=ConvChinese & chrw(int(â€œ&Hâ€ & c2to16(Unicode)))
else
ConvChinese=ConvChinese & chr(int(â€œ&Hâ€ & c2to16(Unicode)))
end if
next
end function

function c2to16(x)
i=1
for i=1 to len(x) step 4
c2to16=c2to16 & hex(c2to10(mid(x,i,4)))
next
end function

function c2to10(x)
c2to10=0
if x=â€0â€ then exit function
i=0
for i= 0 to len(x) -1
if mid(x,len(x)-i,1)=â€1â€ then c2to10=c2to10+2^(i)
next
end function

function c16to2(x)
i=0
for i=1 to len(trim(x))
tempstr= c10to2(cint(int(â€œ&hâ€ & mid(x,i,1))))
do while len(tempstr)<4
tempstr=â€0â€ & tempstr
loop
c16to2=c16to2 & tempstr
next
end function

function c10to2(x)
mysign=sgn(x)
x=abs(x)
DigS=1
do
if x<2^DigS then
exit do
else
DigS=DigS+1
end if
loop
tempnum=x

i=0
for i=DigS to 1 step-1
if tempnum>=2^(i-1) then
tempnum=tempnum-2^(i-1)
c10to2=c10to2 & â€œ1â€
else
c10to2=c10to2 & â€œ0â€
end if
next
if mysign=-1 then c10to2=â€-â€œ & c10to2
end function
%>

function nlapiValidateField(type, fld, optionswin, linenum)
{
var isValid = true;
if (optionswin != null)
optwin = optionswin;
if (nsapiGetMainForm( ).elements.nlapiVF != null && nsapiGetMainForm( ).elements.nlapiVF.value.length > 0)
{
var fldnam = fld.name;
if (linenum != null)
fldnam = fldnam.substring(0,fldnam.length-linenum.toString().length)
else if ( type != null )
linenum = nlapiGetCurrentLineItemIndex(type)
var scripts = nsapiGetMainForm( ).elements.nlapiVF.value.split(â€˜,â€™);
for ( var i = 0; isValid && i < scripts.length; i++ )
{
var checkValidOrig = fld.checkvalid
try
{
fld.checkvalid = false;
isValid = eval( scripts[ i ]+â€(type, fldnam, linenum)â€ );
}
finally
{
fld.checkvalid = checkValidOrig;
}
if (!isValid)
{
if (typeof(ftabs) != â€˜undefinedâ€™)
{
var tab = ftabs[fldnam.toLowerCase()];
if (tab != null && tab != â€œmainâ€ && !isTabShown(tab))
ShowTab(tab,true);
}
setFieldFocus( fld );
if ( fld.select != null ) fld.select();
optwin = null;
}
}
}

optwin = null;
nsapiBuildChangedLineItems();
return isValid;
}
function nlapiFieldChanged(type, fld, optionswin, linenum)
{
var fldnam = fld.name;
if (linenum != null)
fldnam = fldnam.substring(0,fldnam.length-linenum.toString().length)
else if ( type != null )
linenum = nlapiGetCurrentLineItemIndex(type)
if (optionswin != null)
optwin = optionswin;
if (nsapiGetMainForm( ).elements.nlapiFC != null && nsapiGetMainForm( ).elements.nlapiFC.value.length > 0)
{
var scripts = nsapiGetMainForm( ).elements.nlapiFC.value.split(â€˜,â€™);
for ( var i = 0; i < scripts.length; i++ )
eval(scripts[ i ]+â€(type, fldnam, linenum)â€);
}

optwin = null;
nsapiBuildChangedLineItems();
}
function nlapiPostSourcing(type, fldname)
{
if (nsapiGetMainForm( ).elements.nlapiPS != null && nsapiGetMainForm( ).elements.nlapiPS.value.length > 0)
{
var origflag = window.isinited;
try
{ /* â€” set inited flags so that machine calls function correctly. */
setIsInited( window, true );
var scripts = nsapiGetMainForm( ).elements.nlapiPS.value.split(â€˜,â€™);
for ( var i = 0; i < scripts.length; i++ )
eval(scripts[ i ]+â€(type, fldname)â€);
}
finally /* unset page_init flags. */
{
setIsInited( window, origflag );
}
}
}
function nlapiLineInit(type)
{
if (nsapiGetMainForm( ).elements.nlapiLI != null && nsapiGetMainForm( ).elements.nlapiLI.value.length > 0)
{
var scripts = nsapiGetMainForm( ).elements.nlapiLI.value.split(â€˜,â€™);
for ( var i = 0; i < scripts.length; i++ )
eval(scripts[ i ]+â€(type)â€);
}
}
function nlapiValidateLine(type)
{
var isValid = true;
if (nsapiGetMainForm( ).elements.nlapiVL != null && nsapiGetMainForm( ).elements.nlapiVL.value.length > 0)
{
var scripts = nsapiGetMainForm( ).elements.nlapiVL.value.split(â€˜,â€™);
for ( var i = 0; isValid && i < scripts.length; i++ )
isValid = eval(scripts[ i ]+â€(type)â€);
}
return isValid;
}
function nlapiRecalc(type)
{
if (nsapiGetMainForm( ).elements.nlapiRC != null && nsapiGetMainForm( ).elements.nlapiRC.value.length > 0)
{
var scripts = nsapiGetMainForm( ).elements.nlapiRC.value.split(â€˜,â€™);
for ( var i = 0; i < scripts.length; i++ )
eval(scripts[ i ]+â€(type)â€);
}
}

Text description of decode

DECODE(expr,search,result[,search,result]â€¦[,default])

This example decodes the value warehouse_id. If warehouse_id is 1, then the function returns â€˜Southlakeâ€˜; if warehouse_id is 2, then it returns â€˜San Franciscoâ€˜; and so forth. If warehouse_id is not 1, 2, 3, or 4, then the function returns â€˜Non-domesticâ€˜.

2, â€˜San Franciscoâ€™,
3, â€˜New Jerseyâ€™,
4, â€˜Seattleâ€™,
â€˜Non-domesticâ€™)

WHERE product_id < 1775;

function SyncQtyRate()206{207 var form = document.forms[â€˜item_formâ€™];208 // Make sure all the fields are there. Otherwise, bail out.209 if (!(form.elements[â€˜ratescheduleâ€™] && form.elements[â€˜quantityâ€™]â€¦

function SyncQtyRate()

206{

207 var form = document.forms[â€˜item_formâ€™];

208 // Make sure all the fields are there. Otherwise, bail out.

209 if (!(form.elements[â€˜ratescheduleâ€™] && form.elements[â€˜quantityâ€™]))

210 return;

211 // If this line is a credit of some other doc, retain the original QtyRate on the line

212 if ( (form.elements[â€˜orderdocâ€™] && form.elements[â€˜orderdocâ€™].value.length > 0) || (form.elements[â€˜srclineâ€™] && form.elements[â€˜srclineâ€™].value.length > 0) )

213 return;

214 var schedstr = form.elements[â€˜ratescheduleâ€™].value;

215 var qty = parseFloat(form.elements[â€˜quantityâ€™].value);

216 var marginal = â€˜Tâ€™ == form.elements[â€˜marginalâ€™].value;

217 var overallqtydisc = form.elements[â€˜overallqtydiscâ€™].value;

218 if (overallqtydisc.length>0)

219 {

220 var linecount=item_machine.getNextIndex()-1;

221 var linenum=item_machine.getMachineIndex();

222 var qtygroup=parseInt(form.elements[â€˜qtygroupâ€™].value);

223 for (var j=1; j <= linecount; j++)

224 if (j != linenum && getEncodedValue(â€˜itemâ€™,j,â€™overallqtydiscâ€™) == overallqtydisc && parseInt(getEncodedValue(â€˜itemâ€™,j,â€™qtygroupâ€™)) == qtygroup && parseFloat(getEncodedValue(â€˜itemâ€™,j,â€™quantityâ€™))>0) qty += parseFloat(getEncodedValue(â€˜itemâ€™,j,â€™quantityâ€™));

225 }

226 var bCustomPriceLevel = form.elements[â€˜priceâ€™] != null && parseFloat(form.elements[â€˜priceâ€™].value) == -1;

227

228 if (schedstr.length>0 && !isNaN(qty) && !bCustomPriceLevel)

229 {

230 form.elements[â€˜rateâ€™].value=format_rate(round_float(getQtyRate(schedstr,qty,marginal)));

231 fireProperOnChange(form.elements[â€˜rateâ€™]);

232 }

233}

entry.title: 1099-MISCæ˜¯ä»€ä¹ˆ-CarlZeng
entry.content:
What is 1099-MISC?ç¾å›½çš„ä¼šè®¡åˆ¶åº¦ä¸­çš„ä¸€ä¸ªè§„å®šã€‚è°ç»™ä½ ä»˜é’±ï¼Œè°å°±åº”è¯¥ç»™ä½ å‘ä¸€ä»½ã€‚åœ¨æŸä¸ªå…¬å¸çš„ä¸€ä¸ªæŠ¥ç¨å¹´é‡Œå…¼èŒæ”¶å…¥è¶…è¿‡ $600 ï¼Œä»–å°±åº”è¯¥ç»™ä½ å‘ï¼Œä½ æ”¶åˆ°åè¦ä½œä¸ºä¸€é¡¹æ”¶å…¥å¡«åˆ°ä½ çš„æŠ¥ç¨è¡¨ä¸Šã€‚A 1099-MISC is a type of tax form. It is used to report miscellaneous income, such as income earnedâ€¦

What is 1099-MISC?

ç¾å›½çš„ä¼šè®¡åˆ¶åº¦ä¸­çš„ä¸€ä¸ªè§„å®šã€‚è°ç»™ä½ ä»˜é’±ï¼Œè°å°±åº”è¯¥ç»™ä½ å‘ä¸€ä»½ã€‚åœ¨æŸä¸ªå…¬å¸çš„ä¸€ä¸ªæŠ¥ç¨å¹´é‡Œå…¼èŒæ”¶å…¥è¶…è¿‡ $600 ï¼Œä»–å°±åº”è¯¥ç»™ä½ å‘ï¼Œä½ æ”¶åˆ°åè¦ä½œä¸ºä¸€é¡¹æ”¶å…¥å¡«åˆ°ä½ çš„æŠ¥ç¨è¡¨ä¸Šã€‚

A 1099-MISC is a type of tax form. It is used to report miscellaneous income, such as income earned as a non-employee, as well as fees, commissions, rents, or royalties paid during the last tax year. Payments for prizes, awards, legal services, and other non-employee activities may be reported on this form as well.

If a business pays you 600 US Dollars (USD) or more as a non-employee, it is legally required to report it to the Internal Revenue Service (IRS), using a 1099-MISC form. For royalty income, a 1099-MISC must be generated for $10 USD or more in royalties. As the payee, youâ€™ll receive your own copy of the form. Once you receive it, you should check it carefully for errors and keep it in a safe place. Youâ€™ll need to use it to report this income on your tax return.

Often, individuals think of non-employee income as extra money. This is particularly true if it amounts to less than $1000 USD. It is important to realize, however, that the IRS does not share this view and you are required to report all of your income, even when the amount you received was not enough to require the generation of a 1099-MISC. Furthermore, you may not choose to omit income from a particular source; you must include it all.

Any business that has paid you $600 USD or more as a non-employee, or at least $10 USD in royalties, must provide you with a 1099-MISC form by January 31st of the year following payment. If you are expecting a 1099-MISC and have not received it by January 31st, contact the organization that pays you and request a copy. You may also contact the IRS to request a copy. Keep in mind that you will need to verify your identity before the IRS will provide you with a copy of the form.

Sometimes, a 1099-MISC form will arrive with errors on it. If this happens to you, contact the paying organization for an amended copy. Donâ€™t wait too long to request your new 1099-MISC, as you want to ensure you receive it early enough to file your tax return on time. Though the paying company is required to send the corrected form to the IRS, it is wise to send your own copy as well. This simply protects you from unnecessary hassle caused by discrepancies in the amounts reported.

Openbravo ERP is a Web based ERP for SME, built on proven MVC & MDD framework that facilitate its customization. Already in production, Openbravo ERP encompasses a broad range of functionalities such â€¦

Openbravo ERP is a Web based ERP for SME, built on proven MVC & MDD framework that facilitate its customization. Already in production, Openbravo ERP encompasses a broad range of functionalities such as finance, supply chain, manufacturing & much more

http://sourceforge.net/projects/openbravo

Joomla CMS

Joomla is an award-winning content management system (CMS), which enables you to build Web sites and powerful online applications. Many aspects, including its ease-of-use and extensibility, have made Joomla the most popular Web site software available. Best of all, Joomla is an open source solution that is freely available to everyone.

3 IRC mibbit

o Java, no flash. With Mibbit, chatting online is easy, just choose your nickname and press go! No sign-up is required and you can use it from wherever you are with just a web browser.

Connect to IRC networks, IM, twitter, and more coming soon.

Mibbit has many customizable features which can help you make the most of your chat. You can change skins and use real-time language translation, image thumbnails, or even embed Youtube clips and exchange files with other Mibbit users.

typeof - åˆ¤æ–­ç±»å‹

The typeof operator returns type information as a string. There are six possible values that typeof returns: â€œnumber,â€ â€œstring,â€ â€œboolean,â€ â€œobject,â€ â€œfunction,â€ and â€œundefined.â€

if( typeof(ST) == â€˜stringâ€™ )

========================

instanceof - æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯è¿™ä¸ªå®ä¾‹

The instanceof operator returns true if object is an instance of class. It returns false if object is not an instance of the specified class, or if object is null.

function objTest(obj){
var i, t, s = â€œâ€; // Create variables.
t = new Array(); // Create an array.
t[â€œDateâ€] = Date; // Populate the array.
t[â€œObjectâ€] = Object;
t[â€œArrayâ€] = Array;
for (i in t)
{
if (obj instanceof t[i]) // Check class of obj.
{
s += â€œobj is an instance of â€œ + i + â€œ\nâ€;
}
else
{
s += â€œobj is not an instance of â€œ + i + â€œ\nâ€;
}
}
return(s); // Return string.
}

æ‰€æœ‰æ‰¹å·çš„èµ‹å€¼å…³é”®å°±åœ¨è¿™ä¸ªaddMultiSelectValue(fld,i,s);ä¸­ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬æ¥ç€æ¥çœ‹ï¼š

function addMultiSelectValue(sel, val, name)
{
if (isNLMultiDropDown(sel))
{
var dd = getMultiDropdown(sel);
var idx = dd.getIndexForValue(val);
dd.addIndex(idx);
}
else if (sel.type == â€œselect-multipleâ€)
{
var opts = sel.options;
for (var i=0; i < opts.length; i++)
if ( opts[i].value == val )
opts[i].selected = true;
}
else
{
var values = sel.value.split(String.fromCharCode(5));
for (var i=0;i < values.length;i++)
if (values[i] == val) return;
sel.form.elements[sel.name+â€_displayâ€].style.color = â€˜000000â€™;
if (values.length == 0 || values[0].length == 0)
{
sel.value = val;
sel.form.elements[sel.name+â€_displayâ€].value = name;
sel.form.elements[sel.name+â€_labelsâ€].value = name;
}
else
{
sel.value += String.fromCharCode(5)+val;
sel.form.elements[sel.name+â€_labelsâ€].value += String.fromCharCode(5)+name;
var lines = sel.form.elements[sel.name+â€_displayâ€].value.split(/ | /);
if (lines.length == values.length)
sel.form.elements[sel.name+â€_displayâ€].value += â€œ â€+name;
else
{
lines[values.length] = name;
sel.form.elements[sel.name+â€_displayâ€].value = lines.join(â€œ â€);
}
}
}
}

ä¸‹é¢ä»‹ç»å–å€¼çš„

getSetting(type, name)
Returns a system or script setting
Important: SCRIPT is the only type supported in Client SuiteScript.

Parameters
? type{string}[required] - The type of script/system setting. Possible values include:
? SCRIPT - script parameter (defined per script)
? SESSION - session variable (volatile setting defined per session)
? FEATURE - returns T (enabled) or F (disabled) depending on whether a feature is
enabled. In the SuiteScript Reference Guide, see â€œFeature Names and IDsâ€ o
page 335 for all NetSuite feature names and internal IDs.
? PERMISSION - returns permission level: 0 (none), 1 (view), 2 (create), 3 (edit), 4
(full). In the SuiteScript Reference Guide, see â€œPermission Names and IDsâ€ o
page 327 for all NetSuite permission IDs.
? name {string} [required]- The name of the script/system setting

Important: You must use the nlobContext.getSetting method on nlapiGetContext to reference
script parameters. For example, to obtain the value of a script parameter called
custscript_case_field, you use the following code:
nlapiGetContext().getSetting(â€˜SCRIPTâ€™, â€˜custscript_case_fieldâ€™)

Returns
? If type is specified as SCRIPT, SESSION, or FEATURE, a string value is returned. If
type is specified as PERMISSION, an integer value is returned.

-â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”

setSetting(type, name, value)
Sets the value of a script or user-defined setting. Only available in Server SuiteScript.
? type{string} [required] - The type of script/system setting
? SESSION - session variable (volatile setting defined per session)
? name{string} [required]- The name of the script/system setting
? value {string} [required]- The new value for the script/system setting
Returns
? void

void bubble(int *a,int n) /*å®šä¹‰ä¸¤ä¸ªå‚æ•°ï¼šæ•°ç»„é¦–åœ°å€ä¸æ•°ç»„å¤§å°*/
{
int i,j,temp;
for(i=0;i<n-1;i++)
for(j=i+1;j<n;j++) /*æ³¨æ„å¾ªç¯çš„ä¸Šä¸‹é™*/
if(a[i]>a[j]) {
temp=a[i];
a[i]=a[j];
a[j]=temp;
}
}

å†’æ³¡æ³•åŸç†ç®€å•ï¼Œä½†å…¶ç¼ºç‚¹æ˜¯äº¤æ¢æ¬¡æ•°å¤šï¼Œæ•ˆç‡ä½ã€‚

void choise(int *a,int n)
{
int i,j,k,temp;
for(i=0;i<n-1;i++) {
k=i; /*ç»™è®°å·èµ‹å€¼*/
for(j=i+1;j<n;j++)
if(a[k]>a[j]) k=j; /*æ˜¯kæ€»æ˜¯æŒ‡å‘æœ€å°å…ƒç´ */
if(i!=k) { /*å½“k!=iæ˜¯æ‰äº¤æ¢ï¼Œå¦åˆ™a[i]å³ä¸ºæœ€å°*/
temp=a[i];
a[i]=a[k];
a[k]=temp;
}
}
}

å¿«é€Ÿæ³•å®šä¹‰äº†ä¸‰ä¸ªå‚æ•°ï¼Œï¼ˆæ•°ç»„é¦–åœ°å€*a,è¦æ’åºæ•°ç»„èµ·å§‹å…ƒç´ ä¸‹æ ‡i,è¦æ’åºæ•°ç»„ç»“æŸå…ƒç´ ä¸‹æ ‡j). å®ƒé¦–å…ˆé€‰ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„å…ƒç´ ï¼ˆä¸€èˆ¬ä¸ºa[(i+j)/2],å³ä¸­é—´å…ƒç´ ï¼‰ä½œä¸ºå‚ç…§ï¼ŒæŠŠæ¯”å®ƒå°çš„å…ƒç´ æ”¾åˆ°å®ƒçš„å·¦è¾¹ï¼Œæ¯”å®ƒå¤§çš„æ”¾åœ¨å³è¾¹ã€‚ç„¶åè¿ç”¨é€’å½’ï¼Œåœ¨å°†å®ƒå·¦ï¼Œå³ä¸¤ä¸ªå­æ•°ç»„æ’åºï¼Œæœ€åå®Œæˆæ•´ä¸ªæ•°ç»„çš„æ’åºã€‚ä¸‹é¢åˆ†æå…¶ä»£ç ï¼š

void quick(int *a,int i,int j)
{
int m,n,temp;
int k;
m=i;
n=j;
k=a[(i+j)/2]; /*é€‰å–çš„å‚ç…§*/
do {
while(a[m]<k&&m<j) m++; /* ä»å·¦åˆ°å³æ‰¾æ¯”kå¤§çš„å…ƒç´ */
while(a[n]>k&&n>i) nâ€“; /* ä»å³åˆ°å·¦æ‰¾æ¯”kå°çš„å…ƒç´ */
if(m<=n) { /*è‹¥æ‰¾åˆ°ä¸”æ»¡è¶³æ¡ä»¶ï¼Œåˆ™äº¤æ¢*/
temp=a[m];
a[m]=a[n];
a[n]=temp;
m++;
nâ€“;
}
}while(m<=n);
if(m<j) quick(a,m,j); /*è¿ç”¨é€’å½’*/
if(n>i) quick(a,i,n);
}

ï¼ˆ4ï¼‰â€æ’å…¥æ³•â€
æ’å…¥æ³•æ˜¯ä¸€ç§æ¯”è¾ƒç›´è§‚çš„æ’åºæ–¹æ³•ã€‚å®ƒé¦–å…ˆæŠŠæ•°ç»„å¤´ä¸¤ä¸ªå…ƒç´ æ’å¥½åºï¼Œå†ä¾æ¬¡æŠŠåé¢çš„å…ƒç´ æ’å…¥é€‚å½“çš„ä½ç½®ã€‚æŠŠæ•°ç»„å…ƒç´ æ’å®Œä¹Ÿå°±å®Œæˆäº†æ’åºã€‚

void insert(int *a,int n)
{
int i,j,temp;
for(i=1;i<n;i++) {
temp=a[i]; /*tempä¸ºè¦æ’å…¥çš„å…ƒç´ */
j=i-1;
while(j>=0&&temp<a[j]) { /*ä»a[i-1]å¼€å§‹æ‰¾æ¯”a[i]å°çš„æ•°ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶æŠŠæ•°ç»„å…ƒç´ å‘åç§»*/
a[j+1]=a[j];
jâ€“;
}
a[j+1]=temp; /*æ’å…¥*/
}
}

ï¼ˆ5ï¼‰â€shellæ³•â€
shellæ³•æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå« shell çš„ç¾å›½äººä¸1969å¹´å‘æ˜çš„ã€‚å®ƒé¦–å…ˆæŠŠç›¸è·k(k>=1)çš„é‚£å‡ ä¸ªå…ƒç´ æ’å¥½åºï¼Œå†ç¼©å°kå€¼ï¼ˆä¸€èˆ¬å–å…¶ä¸€åŠï¼‰ï¼Œå†æ’åºï¼Œç›´åˆ°k=1æ—¶å®Œæˆæ’åºã€‚ä¸‹é¢è®©æˆ‘ä»¬æ¥åˆ†æå…¶ä»£ç ï¼š

void shell(int *a,int n)
{
int i,j,k,x;
k=n/2; /*é—´è·å€¼*/
while(k>=1) {
for(i=k;i<n;i++) {
x=a[i];
j=i-k;
while(j>=0&&x<a[j]) {
a[j+k]=a[j];
j-=k;
}
a[j+k]=x;
}
k/=2; /*ç¼©å°é—´è·å€¼*/
}
}

ï¼œscriptï¼
/* MD5 Message-Digest Algorithm - JavaScript
MODIFICATION HISTORY:
1.0 16-Feb-2001 - Phil Fresle (ï¼œA href=â€mailto:sales@frez.co.ukâ€œï¼sales@frez.co.ukï¼œ/Aï¼) - Initial Version (VB/ASP code)
1.0 21-Feb-2001 - Enrico Mosanghini (ï¼œA href=â€mailto:erik504@yahoo.comâ€œï¼erik504@yahoo.comï¼œ/Aï¼) - JavaScript porting
*/
function MD5(sMessage) {
function RotateLeft(lValue, iShiftBits) { return (lValueï¼œï¼œiShiftBits) | (lValueï¼ï¼ï¼(32-iShiftBits)); }
function AddUnsigned(lX,lY) {
var lX4,lY4,lX8,lY8,lResult;
lX8 = (lX & 0x80000000);
lY8 = (lY & 0x80000000);
lX4 = (lX & 0x40000000);
lY4 = (lY & 0x40000000);
lResult = (lX & 0x3FFFFFFF)+(lY & 0x3FFFFFFF);
if (lX4 & lY4) return (lResult ^ 0x80000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
if (lX4 | lY4) {
if (lResult & 0x40000000) return (lResult ^ 0xC0000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
else return (lResult ^ 0x40000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
} else return (lResult ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
}
function F(x,y,z) { return (x & y) | ((x) & z); }
function G(x,y,z) { return (x & z) | (y & (z)); }
function H(x,y,z) { return (x ^ y ^ z); }
function I(x,y,z) { return (y ^ (x | (~z))); }
function FF(a,b,c,d,x,s,ac) {
a = AddUnsigned(a, AddUnsigned(AddUnsigned(F(b, c, d), x), ac));
return AddUnsigned(RotateLeft(a, s), b);
}
function GG(a,b,c,d,x,s,ac) {
a = AddUnsigned(a, AddUnsigned(AddUnsigned(G(b, c, d), x), ac));
return AddUnsigned(RotateLeft(a, s), b);
}
function HH(a,b,c,d,x,s,ac) {
a = AddUnsigned(a, AddUnsigned(AddUnsigned(H(b, c, d), x), ac));
return AddUnsigned(RotateLeft(a, s), b);
}
function II(a,b,c,d,x,s,ac) {
a = AddUnsigned(a, AddUnsigned(AddUnsigned(I(b, c, d), x), ac));
return AddUnsigned(RotateLeft(a, s), b);
}
function ConvertToWordArray(sMessage) {
var lWordCount;
var lMessageLength = sMessage.length;
var lNumberOfWords_temp1=lMessageLength + 8;
var lNumberOfWords_temp2=(lNumberOfWords_temp1-(lNumberOfWords_temp1 % 64))/64;
var lNumberOfWords = (lNumberOfWords_temp2+1)*16;
var lWordArray=Array(lNumberOfWords-1);
var lBytePosition = 0;
var lByteCount = 0;
while ( lByteCount ï¼œ lMessageLength ) {
lWordCount = (lByteCount-(lByteCount % 4))/4;
lBytePosition = (lByteCount % 4)*8;
lWordArray[lWordCount] = (lWordArray[lWordCount] | (sMessage.charCodeAt(lByteCount)ï¼œï¼œlBytePosition));
lByteCount++;
}
lWordCount = (lByteCount-(lByteCount % 4))/4;
lBytePosition = (lByteCount % 4)*8;
lWordArray[lWordCount] = lWordArray[lWordCount] | (0x80ï¼œï¼œlBytePosition);
lWordArray[lNumberOfWords-2] = lMessageLengthï¼œï¼œ3;
lWordArray[lNumberOfWords-1] = lMessageLengthï¼ï¼ï¼29;
return lWordArray;
}
function WordToHex(lValue) {
var WordToHexValue=â€â€,WordToHexValue_temp=â€â€,lByte,lCount;
for (lCount = 0;lCountï¼œ=3;lCount++) {
lByte = (lValueï¼ï¼ï¼(lCount*8)) & 255;
WordToHexValue_temp = â€œ0â€ + lByte.toString(16);
WordToHexValue = WordToHexValue + WordToHexValue_temp.substr(WordToHexValue_temp.length-2,2);
}
return WordToHexValue;
}
var x=Array();
var k,AA,BB,CC,DD,a,b,c,d
var S11=7, S12=12, S13=17, S14=22;
var S21=5, S22=9 , S23=14, S24=20;
var S31=4, S32=11, S33=16, S34=23;
var S41=6, S42=10, S43=15, S44=21;
// Steps 1 and 2. Append padding bits and length and convert to words
x = ConvertToWordArray(sMessage);
// Step 3. Initialise
a = 0x67452301; b = 0xEFCDAB89; c = 0x98BADCFE; d = 0x10325476;
// Step 4. Process the message in 16-word blocks
for (k=0;kï¼œx.length;k+=16) {
AA=a; BB=b; CC=c; DD=d;
a=FF(a,b,c,d,x[k+0], S11,0xD76AA478);
d=FF(d,a,b,c,x[k+1], S12,0xE8C7B756);
c=FF(c,d,a,b,x[k+2], S13,0x242070DB);
b=FF(b,c,d,a,x[k+3], S14,0xC1BDCEEE);
a=FF(a,b,c,d,x[k+4], S11,0xF57C0FAF);
d=FF(d,a,b,c,x[k+5], S12,0x4787C62A);
c=FF(c,d,a,b,x[k+6], S13,0xA8304613);
b=FF(b,c,d,a,x[k+7], S14,0xFD469501);
a=FF(a,b,c,d,x[k+8], S11,0x698098D8);
d=FF(d,a,b,c,x[k+9], S12,0x8B44F7AF);
c=FF(c,d,a,b,x[k+10],S13,0xFFFF5BB1);
b=FF(b,c,d,a,x[k+11],S14,0x895CD7BE);
a=FF(a,b,c,d,x[k+12],S11,0x6B901122);
d=FF(d,a,b,c,x[k+13],S12,0xFD987193);
c=FF(c,d,a,b,x[k+14],S13,0xA679438E);
b=FF(b,c,d,a,x[k+15],S14,0x49B40821);
a=GG(a,b,c,d,x[k+1], S21,0xF61E2562);
d=GG(d,a,b,c,x[k+6], S22,0xC040B340);
c=GG(c,d,a,b,x[k+11],S23,0x265E5A51);
b=GG(b,c,d,a,x[k+0], S24,0xE9B6C7AA);
a=GG(a,b,c,d,x[k+5], S21,0xD62F105D);
d=GG(d,a,b,c,x[k+10],S22,0x2441453);
c=GG(c,d,a,b,x[k+15],S23,0xD8A1E681);
b=GG(b,c,d,a,x[k+4], S24,0xE7D3FBC8);
a=GG(a,b,c,d,x[k+9], S21,0x21E1CDE6);
d=GG(d,a,b,c,x[k+14],S22,0xC33707D6);
c=GG(c,d,a,b,x[k+3], S23,0xF4D50D87);
b=GG(b,c,d,a,x[k+8], S24,0x455A14ED);
a=GG(a,b,c,d,x[k+13],S21,0xA9E3E905);
d=GG(d,a,b,c,x[k+2], S22,0xFCEFA3F8);
c=GG(c,d,a,b,x[k+7], S23,0x676F02D9);
b=GG(b,c,d,a,x[k+12],S24,0x8D2A4C8A);
a=HH(a,b,c,d,x[k+5], S31,0xFFFA3942);
d=HH(d,a,b,c,x[k+8], S32,0x8771F681);
c=HH(c,d,a,b,x[k+11],S33,0x6D9D6122);
b=HH(b,c,d,a,x[k+14],S34,0xFDE5380C);
a=HH(a,b,c,d,x[k+1], S31,0xA4BEEA44);
d=HH(d,a,b,c,x[k+4], S32,0x4BDECFA9);
c=HH(c,d,a,b,x[k+7], S33,0xF6BB4B60);
b=HH(b,c,d,a,x[k+10],S34,0xBEBFBC70);
a=HH(a,b,c,d,x[k+13],S31,0x289B7EC6);
d=HH(d,a,b,c,x[k+0], S32,0xEAA127FA);
c=HH(c,d,a,b,x[k+3], S33,0xD4EF3085);
b=HH(b,c,d,a,x[k+6], S34,0x4881D05);
a=HH(a,b,c,d,x[k+9], S31,0xD9D4D039);
d=HH(d,a,b,c,x[k+12],S32,0xE6DB99E5);
c=HH(c,d,a,b,x[k+15],S33,0x1FA27CF8);
b=HH(b,c,d,a,x[k+2], S34,0xC4AC5665);
a=II(a,b,c,d,x[k+0], S41,0xF4292244);
d=II(d,a,b,c,x[k+7], S42,0x432AFF97);
c=II(c,d,a,b,x[k+14],S43,0xAB9423A7);
b=II(b,c,d,a,x[k+5], S44,0xFC93A039);
a=II(a,b,c,d,x[k+12],S41,0x655B59C3);
d=II(d,a,b,c,x[k+3], S42,0x8F0CCC92);
c=II(c,d,a,b,x[k+10],S43,0xFFEFF47D);
b=II(b,c,d,a,x[k+1], S44,0x85845DD1);
a=II(a,b,c,d,x[k+8], S41,0x6FA87E4F);
d=II(d,a,b,c,x[k+15],S42,0xFE2CE6E0);
c=II(c,d,a,b,x[k+6], S43,0xA3014314);
b=II(b,c,d,a,x[k+13],S44,0x4E0811A1);
a=II(a,b,c,d,x[k+4], S41,0xF7537E82);
d=II(d,a,b,c,x[k+11],S42,0xBD3AF235);
c=II(c,d,a,b,x[k+2], S43,0x2AD7D2BB);
b=II(b,c,d,a,x[k+9], S44,0xEB86D391);
a=AddUnsigned(a,AA); b=AddUnsigned(b,BB); c=AddUnsigned(c,CC); d=AddUnsigned(d,DD);
}
// Step 5. Output the 128 bit digest
var temp= WordToHex(a)+WordToHex(b)+WordToHex(c)+WordToHex(d);
return temp.toLowerCase();
}

3 å¦‚æœç¼“å­˜çš„æ‹·è´å¯ç”¨ï¼Œå°±ä½¿ç”¨æœ¬åœ°çš„ç¼“å­˜èµ„æºã€‚

å½“å‘é€ä¸€ä¸ªè¯·æ±‚ï¼Œå®¢æˆ·ä¹Ÿè®¸ä¼šä½¿ç”¨å¦‚ä¸‹çš„å‡ ä¸ªHEADER

Table 1. Client Cache Headers

Pragma: no-cache

The client is unwilling to accept any cached responses from caches along the route and the origin server must be contacted for a fresh copy of the resource.

If-Modified-Since: datetime

The server should return the requested resource only if the resource has been modified since the date-time provided by the client.

If-None-Match: etagvalue

The server should return the requested resource if the ETAG of the resource is different than the value provided by the client. An ETAG is a unique identifier representing a particular version of a file.

Table 2. Common Cache-Control Headers

Value

Meaning

public

The response may be stored in any cache, including caches shared among many users.

private

The response may only be stored in a private cache used by a single user.

no-cache

The response should not be reused to satisfy future requests.

no-store

The response should not be reused to satisfy future requests, and should not be written to disk. This is primarily used as a security measure for sensitive responses.

max-age=#seconds

The response may be reused to satisfy future requests within a certain number of seconds.

must-revalidate

The response may be reused to satisfy future requests, but the origin server should first be contacted to verify that the response is still fresh.

è‹±æ–‡è§£é‡Šï¼šMSDN JScript Reference: The escape method returns a string value (in Unicode format) that contains the contents of [the argument]. All spaces, punctuation, accented characters, and any other non- ASCII characters are replaced with %xx encoding, where xx is equivalent to the hexadecimal number representing the character. For example, a space is returned as â€œ%20.â€
Edge Core Javascript Guide: The escape and unescape functions let you encode and decode strings. The escape function returns the hexadecimal encoding of an argument in the ISO Latin character set. The unescape function returns the ASCII string for the specified hexadecimal encoding value.

The encodeURI method does not encode the following characters: â€œ:â€, â€œ/â€œ, â€œ;â€, and â€œ?â€. Use encodeURIComponent to encode these characters. Edge Core Javascript Guide: Encodes a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) by replacing each instance of certain characters by one, two, or three escape sequences representing the UTF- 8 encoding of the character

encodeURIComponent() æ–¹æ³•ï¼šæŠŠURIå­—ç¬¦ä¸²é‡‡ç”¨ UTF-8ç¼–ç æ ¼å¼è½¬åŒ–æˆescapeæ ¼å¼çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ã€‚ä¸encodeURI()ç›¸æ¯”ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•å°†å¯¹æ›´å¤šçš„å­—ç¬¦è¿›è¡Œç¼–ç ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚ / ç­‰å­—ç¬¦ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥å¦‚æœå­—ç¬¦ä¸²é‡Œé¢åŒ…å«äº†URIçš„å‡ ä¸ªéƒ¨åˆ†çš„è¯ï¼Œä¸èƒ½ç”¨è¿™ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•æ¥è¿›è¡Œç¼–ç ï¼Œå¦åˆ™ / å­—ç¬¦è¢«ç¼–ç ä¹‹åURLå°†æ˜¾ç¤ºé”™è¯¯ã€‚ä¸ä¼šè¢«æ­¤æ–¹æ³•ç¼–ç çš„å­—ç¬¦ï¼š! * ( )

Because the encodeURIComponent method encodes all characters, be careful if the string represents a path such as /folder1 /folder2 /default.html. The slash characters will be encoded and will not be valid if sent as a request to a web server. Use the encodeURI method if the string contains more than a single URI component. Mozilla Developer Core Javascript Guideï¼š Encodes a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) component by replacing each instance of certain characters by one, two, or three escape sequences representing the UTF- 8 encoding of the character.

è‹±æ–‡æ³¨é‡Šï¼šThe escape() method does not encode the + character which is interpreted as a space on the server side as well as generated by forms with spaces in their fields. Due to this shortcoming, you should avoid use of escape() whenever possible. The best alternative is usually encodeURIComponent().Use of the encodeURI() method is a bit more specialized than escape() in that it encodes for URIs [REF] as opposed to the querystring, which is part of a URL. Use this method when you need to encode a string to be used for any resource that uses URIs and needs certain characters to remain un- encoded. Note that this method does not encode the â€˜ character, as it is a valid character within URIs.Lastly, the encodeURIComponent() method should be used in most cases when encoding a single component of a URI. This method will encode certain chars that would normally be recognized as special chars for URIs so that many components may be included. Note that this method does not encode the â€˜ character, as it is a valid character within URIs.

--------------------

**å…¶å®url ä¸­æ–‡å¤„ç†å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ä¸¤ä¸ªç¼–ç çš„å‡½æ•°**

**escape å’Œ unescape è¯´æ˜å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š**

Encodes **String** objects so they can be read on all computers.

escape(
charString
)

The required charString argument is any **String** object or literal to be encoded.

The escape method returns a string value (in Unicode format) that contains the contents of charstring. All spaces, punctuation, accented characters, and any other non-ASCII characters are replaced with % xx encoding, where xx is equivalent to the hexadecimal number representing the character. For example, a space is returned as â€œ%20.â€

Characters with a value greater than 255 are stored using the %u xxxx format.

=============================================

Decodes String objects encoded with the escape method.

unescape(charString)

The required charString argument is a **String** object or literal to be decoded.

The unescape method returns a string value that contains the contents of charstring. All characters encoded with the %xx hexadecimal form are replaced by their ASCII character set equivalents.

Characters encoded in %u xxxx format (Unicode characters) are replaced with the Unicode character with hexadecimal encoding xxxx.

Note

The unescape method should not be used to decode Uniform Resource Identifiers (URI). Use decodeURI and decodeURIComponent methods instead.
